battle.1_stream_body: 冷酷的敌人只有在变成尸体的时候看起来才可爱一点。
battle.2_stream_title: 真是厉害！[playername]歼灭了最为冷酷的敌人！大地都在颤抖！！
battle.2_stream_body: 冷酷的敌人长久以来一直在向我们挑衅，但他们得到的只有贯穿全身的子弹。
battle.3_stream_body: 我正在全球首款即时战略网页游戏【红警大战】中指挥飞机、坦克去轰炸别人的基地，吼吼，指挥战争的感觉真爽！快来和我一起玩吧！

mine.1_stream_body: 最致命的埋伏已经蠢蠢欲动……小心脚下！
mine.1_stream_title: [playername]已在全球首款即时战略网页游戏【红警大战】中拥有了普通地雷，谁敢来试试？！
mine.1_popup_body: 敌人意识到他们踩上什么的时候那个惊恐的表情，太赞了
mine.2_stream_body: 我已经将基地变成了死亡的禁区，你能猜到我把地雷埋在哪里了吗？
mine.2_stream_title: [playername]已在全球首款即时战略网页游戏【红警大战】中拥有了粘土炸药，有人敢来试试吗？
mine.2_popup_body: 成千上万的小钢珠将会吞噬敌军的部队。我喜欢你的新发明，指挥官。
mine.3_stream_body: 这种地雷受到微小的震动就会有强烈的爆炸，当敌人发现自己踩上它的时候，他们的脑浆已经被炸飞好几十米了。
mine.3_stream_title: [playername]竟然在全球首款即时战略网页游戏【红警大战】中拥有了强力地雷，有人想尝尝滋味吗？
mine.3_popup_body: 敌人被跳跳虎炸到在天上飞的样子真的是很欢乐，指挥官，我向你推荐这个节目。
mine.4_stream_body: 这种专注于破坏力的地雷非常吓人——敌人在看到身边被炸飞的残肢断臂的时候，他们将失去举枪的勇气。
mine.4_stream_title: [playername]竟然在全球首款即时战略网页游戏【红警大战】中解锁了彻甲榴弹，有人想尝尝滋味吗？
mine.4_popup_body: 最致命的惊喜，往往会在你最不希望它出现的时候，洞穿你身体的每一寸肌肤。

unit.2_8_popup_title: 把步枪兵带上来！谁敢和我来比枪法？
unit.2_8_popup_body: 干得好，指挥官，你的步枪兵已经升到满级，他们的战斗力也到达了巅峰。
unit.3_1_popup_title: 把他们射成蜂窝！你们都将是我的手下败将！
unit.3_1_popup_body: 指挥官，你刚刚解锁了一个强大的兵种。史泰龙也曾经当过机枪兵。
unit.3_8_popup_title: 一群史泰龙！我不会输给任何人了！
unit.3_8_popup_body: 太牛了，指挥官。你手下拥有了一堆史泰龙一样的机枪兵，还有谁能打得过你？
unit.4_1_popup_title: 开炮！你们的坦克要小心了！！
unit.4_1_popup_body: 指挥官，现在我们不惧怕战车了。我们拥有炮兵！
unit.4_8_popup_body: 看葛炮，学打炮，我会打炮我自豪！
unit.5_1_popup_body: 指挥官，火焰是一种令人兴奋的东西。我们的士兵已经学会喷火了。
unit.5_8_popup_body: 指挥官，观看你的喷火兵战斗是一种享受。没有什么比活人烧焦的味道更令我兴奋了。。
unit.6_1_popup_body: 指挥官，狙击手正等着上战场……这些冷血的杀人机器……
unit.6_8_popup_body: 干得好，指挥官。现在开始，敌人在看不到你的时候也会感到惊恐。
unit.7_1_popup_body: 生命诚可贵，信仰价更高。你的爆破兵已经准备好为国捐躯了。
unit.7_8_popup_body: 指挥官，你的爆破兵拥有无上的信仰和勇气。多亏了他们，我们才能在最少的牺牲下，对敌人造成最大的伤害。
unit.8_1_popup_body: 你真是天才，指挥官。你现在可以生产工程师了，而我也准备好让他们给我做美容了。
unit.8_8_popup_body: 那么，指挥官，你手下的这些技术宅不管多糟的损伤都能修好，但这并不代表他们是好人……
unit.9_1_popup_body: 她们的抚摸有治愈效果，指挥官。你已经可以生产医生了。
unit.9_8_popup_body: 你对伤残人士的关心实在令人感动，指挥官。满级的医生能在30秒内接好一条粉碎性骨折的大腿。
unit.10_1_popup_body: 是时候上路了，指挥官。轻型履带车最适合做人类懒得做的事情。
unit.10_8_popup_body: 指挥官，你的轻型履带车现在令人恐惧。
unit.11_1_popup_body: 是的，这些火箭越野车就是为飞奔而生的。机器也有飞奔的冲动，相信我。
unit.11_8_popup_body: 这些满级的火箭越野车所经过的地方，留下的只有一片火光和废墟。
unit.12_1_popup_body: 如果你在寻找火力与装甲的结合体，我会向你推荐防空车。能对空能对地，杀人一流。
unit.12_8_popup_body: 你的防空车从来不让人失望，指挥官。机枪扫射的声音在我听来是美妙的音符。
unit.13_1_popup_body: 你很有先见之明，指挥官。这些V3火箭车就像移动火药库一样。
unit.13_8_popup_body: 指挥官，何必弄脏你的双手？你的满级V3火箭车可以在敌人的安全距离外把他们的城市“建造”成废墟。
unit.14_1_popup_body: 坦克是人类最伟大的发明之一。会移动的碉堡改变了整个二战的战场，也会改变我们的战争。
unit.14_8_popup_body: 你的灰熊坦克都升到满级了，下一步该干什么好呢？
unit.15_1_popup_body: 非常令人感动，指挥官。当我们有两个种类的坦克，我们就可以布置更多的战术了。
unit.15_8_popup_body: 你真是个野兽，指挥官。全副武装的犀牛坦克令我身上每一片金属都在颤抖。
unit.16_1_popup_body: 你让这个世界变得更美好！由大量金属建造成的坦克杀手令人痴迷，比毒品还让人上瘾！
unit.16_8_popup_body: 没有什么比金属更令人热血沸腾了，指挥官。满级的坦克杀手是战场上的杀戮机器。
unit.17_1_popup_body: Commander, my circuitry indicates it's getting hot in here. You're ready to produce Laser Tanks.
unit.17_8_popup_body: Commander, I know how you love a good light show. Upgraded laser tanks now feature HiPER designed, fast ignition laser cannons.
unit.18_1_popup_body: No enemy above stands a chance against you, Commander, with AA Guns ready for production. Falling bodies and are lovely to watch.
unit.18_8_popup_body: Oh, Commander, your upgraded AA Guns bring enemy airships down with the greatest of ease.
unit.19_1_popup_body: Very clever, Commander, you've unlocked Jammers. Enemy machines will buckle under the weight of the air waves. I prefer to watch from a distance, of course.
unit.19_8_popup_body: Feel free to disrupt frequencies with your upgraded Jammer, Commander. No danger of losing me; I will always be turned on for you.
unit.20_1_popup_body: I admire your instincts, Commander. Your efforts to research Interceptors are successful. Incoming missiles have got nothing on our base.
unit.20_8_popup_body: Don't worry, Commander, nothing, not even missile strikes, can breach our Interceptors now.
unit.21_1_popup_body: 噢，指挥官，你已经可以制造陆地上的终极武器——天启坦克了！他们绝对是战场上的稀有精英。
unit.21_8_popup_body: 这些满级的天启坦克强大到什么程度？往那一站，一炮不开，心脏不好的敌人都能当场吓死。
unit.22_1_popup_body: 极快的偷袭速度，极小的空间占用，极难捕捉的娇小身形，说得就是入侵者战机。
unit.22_8_popup_body: 这些满级的入侵者战机简直是清理战场的利器，无情的杀手。
unit.23_1_popup_body: 你说入侵者战机不好控制，指挥官？那你一定会满意武装直升机的。他们的操作就像陆军一样简单。
unit.23_8_popup_body: 记住，武装直升机的优势，依然是数量。
unit.24_1_popup_body: 干得好，指挥官。夜鹰直升机的血量和火力都高于普通的武装直升机。
unit.24_8_popup_body: 还记得20世纪末叱咤风云的阿帕奇吗？我们吸取了它的灵感，战斗力有过之而无不及。
unit.25_1_popup_body: Commander, UH-60 Choppers are ready to be produced. Blades and missiles together? The carnage is almost too much to hope for...almost.
unit.25_8_popup_body: Darkness falls on our enemies, Commander. With upgraded missiles, your fighters will level buildings in one fell swoop.
unit.26_1_popup_body: 指挥官，你的雷霆战机已经准备好扫荡敌人的老家了。我甚至已经听到敌人在面对雷霆战机无情轰炸时痛苦的尖叫了。
unit.26_8_popup_body: 当雷霆战机的炸弹掉落地面，那爆炸的声音和升起的火光，配在一起是一副多么壮美的画面……
unit.27_1_popup_body: 你又一次提前完成了我的期望，指挥官。现在开始，你的黑鹰战机将会称霸战场——没有人能从它的魔爪下逃生。
unit.27_8_popup_body: 空气中飘荡着敌人的不安和恐惧……每个人都知道，当他的敌人拥有满级黑鹰战机之后，他的下场将是如何惨烈……他们的死刑已经被宣判了，指挥官。
unit.28_1_popup_body: 你又再次让你的军队变得更强大了，指挥官。你竟然成功的解锁了恐怖机器人，这个令人闻风丧胆的武器。
unit.28_8_popup_body: 像你这样的真正的男人，在战场上谈什么计谋都是扯淡，冲上去就是干！让他们知道满级的恐怖机器人是多么恐怖的力量！

building.31_10_popup_body: 太让人感动了，指挥官。我的系统已经跟着作战实验室一起升到满级了。现在所有最高的兵种都可以被开发出来了。
building.31_10_stream_title: [playername]在全球首款即时战略网页游戏【红警大战】中把他的作战实验室升到了顶级。
building.31_10_stream_body: 所有最尖端的武器都已解锁——[playername]正掌握着这个世界最尖端的科技。

mine.mine0_des: 用身边拼凑的炸药临时制作的地雷
mine.mine1_des: 普通的地雷，踩上去会造成大爆炸
mine.mine2_des: 这种破片地雷在爆炸时会飞出无数个钢珠，对敌军造成大面积杀伤。
mine.mine3_des: 这种强大的地雷爆炸的时候能把人炸到10层楼高！
mine.mine4_des: 彻甲榴弹，顾名思义，其威力连坦克的装甲都能轻易击穿！是最顶级的地雷。

store.expand_wall_des: 您将永久增加10个可建造围墙上限
store.resource_compression_des: 让您的储存设备拥有压缩技术，石油和金属的库存上限增加10%
store.daily_protection_des:
您将受到24小时的保护。
攻击任何玩家都会移除保护
store.weekly_protection_des:
您将受到7天的保护。
攻击任何玩家都会移除保护
store.ultimate_protection_des:
您将受到长达28天的保护。
攻击任何玩家都会移除保护
store.can_not_buy_tip: 你的仓库容量得到了飞一般的提升。技术人员将资源压缩到了极限。
store.can_not_buy_wall: 您的围墙扩充已达最大上限！
store.all_walls_upgraded: 您的所有围墙都已升级。
store.walls_upgraded_des1: 非常好，指挥官！没有人能突破你坚若磐石的防线。
store.walls_upgraded_des2: 你的围墙变得越来越赞了，像我一样。
store.walls_upgraded_des3: 太棒了，指挥官。我们的围墙现在可以抵御任何武器的攻击！
store.metal_purchased_des1: 我喜欢冰冷而坚硬的金属，指挥官。现在你拥有了更多这种迷人的东西。
store.metal_purchased_des2: 我有预感，这些额外的金属会让你的基地变得更给力，指挥官。
store.metal_purchased_des3: 我不知道你要拿这么多金属来干什么，指挥官。不过，这种东西多多益善，我喜欢。
store.oil_purchased_des1: 这些额外的石油可以瞬间满足我对润滑剂的需求，指挥官。
store.oil_purchased_des2: 石油这种东西永远是多多益善，指挥官，我非常满意。
store.oil_purchased_des3: 我不知道你要拿这么多石油来干什么，指挥官。不过，石油永远不嫌多，留着用吧。
store.borders_expanded_des1: 恭喜你，指挥官！这些增加的领地会对我们非常有帮助。
store.borders_expanded_des2: 我们有更多的土地去制造敌人的末日，指挥官！
store.borders_expanded_des3: 干得好，指挥官！你的基地，就像你的力量，正在不断增长！
store.borders_expanded_des4: 我就喜欢你这样有野心的男人，指挥官。
store.borders_expanded_des5: 指挥官，一个男人有多大的本事，他就需要多大的基地。现在你已经拥有了一个领土最大的基地，太棒了！
store.borders_expanded_des6: 太棒了！指挥官，您再一次成功扩张领土，我就喜欢你这样勇于突破极限的男人！
store.borders_expanded_des7: 指挥官，比基地更广阔的只有天空，比天空更广阔的是您的胸怀！
store.wall_compressed_des1: 指挥官，您的可建造围墙上限已+10
store.wall_compressed_des2: 太棒了，指挥官，您的可建造围墙上限已达最大！
store.resources_compressed_des1: 对资源的整理是价值的体现，指挥官。多亏了资源压缩技术，我们现在可以在相同的空间内储存更多的资源了。
store.resources_compressed_des2: 我的资源整理技术正在成长，指挥官。我们可以在不升级任何建筑的情况下储存更多的资源。
store.resources_compressed_des3: 你正在为我们的未来作非常有价值的投资，指挥官！你又可以储存更多的资源了。
store.resources_compressed_des4: 我又发现了一种全新的技术，可以把资源中不需要的空间全部抽除，这意味着我们可以在相同的空间内储存更多的资源！
store.resources_compressed_des5: 指挥官，我的资源压缩技术已经到达了世界顶级。你从来没有想过这点空间可以装这么多东西，对吧？

messages.under_attack_des_1: 我正在誓死守卫指挥官您的基地。稍等片刻，很快我就能搞定他们了。
messages.under_attack_des_2: 这名玩家的基地正在被攻击，所以您需要寻找其他的机会了。
messages.attackend_wmattack_won: 您把这个冷酷的敌人的老家拆了个片甲不留，干的很棒，指挥官！
messages.attackend_won: 您成功的破坏了这个玩家的基地，干的不错，指挥官。
messages.attackend_advancedmap_wmattack_failed: 您未能破坏这个冷酷的敌人的基地，请重整部队再来。
messages.attackend_advancedmap_outpost_failed: 您未能摧毁这个前哨，指挥官，请重建您的部队再来。
messages.attackend_wmattack_failed: 您未能摧毁这个冷酷的敌人的指挥中心，请重整部队再来。
messages.attackend_failed: 您未能摧毁这个玩家的基地，请重建您的部队再来。
messages.saving: 服务器正在保存您的数据，为避免出错，请您3秒后重试
messages.finish_no_blue: 蓝钻独享10分钟以内免费加速，非蓝钻用户5分钟以内免费加速.
messages.finish_now: 黄钻独享10分钟以内免费加速，非黄钻用户5分钟以内免费加速.
messages.finish_now1: 会员独享10分钟以内免费加速，非会员用户5分钟以内免费加速.
messages.finish_now_vip: 您是我们尊贵的黄钻用户，10分钟以内免费加速并不收取任何费用。
messages.finish_now_vip1: 您是我们尊贵的会员用户，10分钟以内免费加速并不收取任何费用。
messages.finish_now_blue: 您是我们尊贵的蓝钻用户，10分钟以内免费加速并不收取任何费用。
messages.repair_now: 剩余时间不足5分钟，立刻完成修复并不收取任何费用。
messages.no_power_when_upgrading:
发电机已停止工作！升级过程中，发电厂不能提供任何电力。

您可以加速升级并节省
messages.no_defense_when_upgrading:
我们现在极其脆弱！防御工事在升级过程中无法攻击！

您可以加速升级并节省
messages.reconnect_msg_des: 在吗，指挥官，您在吗？您已经很长时间没有下达任何命令了。
messages.reconnect_msg_des_1: 在吗，指挥官，您还在吗？您已经很长时间没有下达任何命令了。
messages.reconnect_msg_des_2: 在吗？指挥官，您还在吗？您已经很长时间没有下达任何命令了。
messages.reconnect_msg_des_3: 在吗？指挥官，您在吗？您已经很长时间没有下达任何命令了。
messages.reconnect_msg_des_4: 在吗，指挥官。您在吗？您已经很长时间没有下达任何命令了。
messages.reconnect_msg_des_5: 在吗，指挥官。您还在吗？您已经很长时间没有下达任何命令了。
messages.reconnect_msg_des_6: 在吗？指挥官。您在吗？您已经很长时间没有下达任何命令了。
messages.reconnect_msg_des_7: 数据异常！断线处理！已录入您当前游戏ID:
messages.login_times_des: 太嗨了！哈哈哈，想来尝尝我的厉害吗？等你，就在【红警大战】！
messages.login_times_summery: 天天红警，好礼不停，建立自己的军事力量，就在【红警大战】！
messages.not_enough_room:
容量不足。
请建造更多的仓库或者升级现有的仓库。
messages.units_behave_msg: 部署单位以何种姿态保护你的基地。
messages.aggressive_stance:
攻击性
作战单位会主动向任何一个位置的敌人出击并追他们到天涯海角。
messages.normal_stance:
普通
作战单位会追击接近的敌军并回到自己的位置。
messages.stand_ground_stance:
原地驻守
作战单位会向进入射程的单位进行射击，但不会移动。
messages.error_popup:
我们已经记录下了这个错误来帮助我们改进游戏。
如果问题仍未解决，请联系技术支持。
请重新加载页面继续游戏
通常情况下，发生这种错误的原因可能为：
· 您的帐号在其他地方登录了游戏。
· 网络中断。
· 电脑运行缓慢（请关闭浏览器的其他标签）。
messages.not_enough_storage_msg1: 人口不足！请升级指挥中心增加人口上限。
messages.not_enough_storage_msg2: 您的人口已经达到极限。
messages.more_resource_msg:
你需要更多的资源来生产该作战单位。

您可以在商城中购买资源。
messages.btn_goto_shop:
您的资源不足，无法完成拨款。

请前往商城补充资源。
messages.more_resource_msg1: 每成功邀请1位好友即可获得50000金属+50000石油+5勋章奖励！
messages.attack_time_msg: 在作战时间截止之前，您必须尽快完成您的攻击行动。
messages.how_much_deployment: 在这次攻击行动中您分配了多少兵力。
messages.attack_by_ai_enabled:
R.U.B.I.人工智能已启动
如果您没有直接下达作战命令，她将会代替您指挥战斗。
messages.attack_by_ai_disabled:
R.U.B.I.人工智能已关闭
您拥有完全的战斗指挥权，您也可以随时开启R.U.B.I人工智能来帮助您指挥战斗。
messages.already_destroy_msg: 这座基地已经够杯具了，你再打它也抢不到任何资源。
messages.map_msg_higherlv: 对方等级过高，无法进行攻击（等级差超过6级的玩家间不能进行攻击）
messages.war_room_disabled:
间谍卫星已禁用
我们现在正在升级间谍卫星系统，所以我们暂时无法接收到任何卫星信号。
messages.repair_war_room_to_use: 您的间谍卫星损坏度已经超过了50%，请您先修复它再使用。
messages.need_a_war_room_first: 您需要建造“间谍卫星”， 点击底部的“建造”按钮。
messages.gogobarAttack_end_content: 现在需要恢复战前状态，请点击重新连接

npc.npc0_dialog_0_0: 准备迎接您的末日吧，指挥官! 地狱犬会把来自地狱的愤怒全部宣泄到您的身上！
npc.npc0_dialog_0_1: 您的军队根本不配被我的爪牙撕扯！地狱犬将会统治世界，从统治您开始！
npc.npc0_dialog_0_2: 听见了吗，指挥官?这是地狱犬渴望您的鲜血而发出的咆哮！他们很快就可以大快朵颐了……
npc.npc0_dialog_1_0: 不出所料，您那可悲的军力根本不足以抵挡地狱犬的进攻。我们很快就会回来完成对您的毁灭。
npc.npc0_dialog_1_1: 我们会像恶狗抢食一样吞噬您的基地，指挥官. 地狱犬很快就可以宣判您英年早逝的命运。
npc.npc0_dialog_2_0: 您或许打败了我们一次，指挥官。但地狱中的势力永远不会停下脚步，地狱犬会回来的
npc.npc0_dialog_2_1: 您逃得了初一，指挥官，您也逃不了十五！
npc.npc1_dialog_0_0: 一山不容二虎，指挥官！为了正义和秩序，铁血部落迟早会用铁和血给予这个世界应得的制裁，不投降就得死！
npc.npc1_dialog_0_1: 您所处的混沌正像病毒一样蔓延，指挥官。为了世界的清净，铁血部落将会把您彻底肃清。
npc.npc1_dialog_0_2: 因为您这种人的存在，世界的历史在无尽的杀戮和毁灭中度过，指挥官。铁血部落将会给这个世界一个全新的未来——而您并不属于这个未来！
npc.npc1_dialog_1_0: 正义将会胜利，指挥官。您在地球上的日子已经不多了，铁血部落很快会毁灭您。
npc.npc1_dialog_1_1: 正义和秩序是美妙的东西，指挥官，而它们来自于您的战败。只差一步，铁血部落就可以把您轰的连渣都不剩。
npc.npc1_dialog_2_0: 我们会回来的，指挥官！铁血部落将会在您意料不到的时候带着正义的铁锤降临！
npc.npc1_dialog_2_1: 在您还有能力的时候，为自己找好后路吧，指挥官。铁血部落不久就会回来向您复仇。
npc.npc2_dialog_0_0: 您是一块必须被清除的毒瘤，指挥官。准备迎接魔多军团带给您的迅速而痛苦的死亡吧……
npc.npc2_dialog_0_1: 魔多军团很快就要把您打回现实世界了，指挥官。临急抱佛脚吧，如果您觉得有用的话。
npc.npc2_dialog_0_2: 很快就要被历史抹去了，指挥官。魔多军团已经无人能挡了，您也不例外。
npc.npc2_dialog_1_0: 不出所料，打败您根本不需要我们多少时间，指挥官！魔多军团不出三日就能把您杀的片甲不留。
npc.npc2_dialog_1_1: 苟延残喘吧，指挥官。可悲的是，您的防卫力量根本不堪一击。
npc.npc2_dialog_2_0: 享受您短暂的胜利吧，指挥官。魔多军团会回来的！
npc.npc2_dialog_2_1: 打不倒我们的攻击只会让我们更强大，指挥官。您应该对我们下一次的反击感到恐惧。
npc.npc3_dialog_0_0: 黑寡妇准备在您家后院布下天罗地网，指挥官。您的死亡将会在您感觉到恐惧之前降临
npc.npc3_dialog_0_1: 您的存在对这个世界来说是剧毒，而黑寡妇则是解药。迎接毁灭吧。
npc.npc3_dialog_0_2: 您就像是被蜘蛛网缠住的苍蝇，指挥官。黑寡妇将会美美的享受一顿饱餐。
npc.npc3_dialog_1_0: 您大男子主义的那点嚣张的气焰似乎就是您的全部了吧，指挥官。永远不要低估黑寡妇!
npc.npc3_dialog_1_1: 如果破除您的防御就像解剖您的身体一样容易的话，您将会死的非常孤独，指挥官。黑寡妇很乐意把您从痛苦中解脱出来。
npc.npc3_dialog_2_0: 您会后悔的，指挥官！最毒不过妇人心，这是流传了几千年的一句古话。想想其中的道理。
npc.npc3_dialog_2_1: 忍耐是一种美德，指挥官，而黑寡妇最擅长这个。我们将会卧薪尝胆积蓄力量，再次回来的时候就会彻底歼灭您。
npc.npc4_dialog_0_0: 您的好战就像个毒瘤一样在地球上扩散。为了维持世界的和平，为了防止宇宙被破坏，游牧民族会把您们这些好战分子全部清除。
npc.npc4_dialog_0_1: 在您们这些愚蠢而贪婪的好战分子出现之前，世界曾经如此的美丽而和平，指挥官。是时候偿还您对地球犯下的罪行了！
npc.npc4_dialog_0_2: 准备好迎接您的终结吧，指挥官。游牧民族会像东方升起的红日驱走黑暗那样，驱赶您们！
npc.npc4_dialog_1_0: 大地母亲打了一场胜仗，指挥官！一旦游牧民族完成了对您们的驱逐，我们便可以复兴和平大地上沉寂已久的绿色……
npc.npc4_dialog_1_1: 您的毁灭让我们在前往和平的道路上又近了一步，指挥官。游牧民族很快就会把您的存在从历史上抹去。
npc.npc4_dialog_2_0: 您给世界造成了流血不止的创伤，指挥官。但游牧民族将会回来，而您将会付出代价，致命的代价。
npc.npc4_dialog_2_1: 您正在走向毁灭，指挥官，而游牧民族将会加速这个过程。
npc.npc5_dialog_0_0: 您的邪恶即将走到尽头，指挥官！神圣十字军会把您这个渎神者彻底扫出这个星球。
npc.npc5_dialog_0_1: 您挡在了神圣十字军伸张正义的道路上，指挥官。准备迎接造物主的审判吧！
npc.npc5_dialog_0_2: 上帝对每个人的命运都有安排，指挥官！我们的命运将是统治世界；而您的命运则终将走向毁灭。
npc.npc5_dialog_1_0: 看到了吗，指挥官？正义终将战胜邪恶。神圣十字军将会清洗这个世界上所有不神圣的一切。
npc.npc5_dialog_1_1: 上帝用胜利回应了我们的虔诚，指挥官。神圣十字军很快会把您从这个星球上削除。
npc.npc5_dialog_2_0: 也许您侥幸赢得了此次胜利，指挥官，但圣战永远不会停息！上帝与我们同在！
npc.npc5_dialog_2_1: 上帝会制裁您的，指挥官！神圣十字军终将胜利

tutorials.2_txt: 欢迎回来指挥官，我一直在等待您的归来。
tutorials.4_txt: 欢迎您来到【<font color = '#ff0000'>红警大战</font>】，作为您征战疆场的大本营，您的基地防御略显单薄，<font color = '#fcff00'>建造机枪塔</font>来增加基地的防御吧！
tutorials.11_txt: 建造机枪塔需要使用一定的资源
tutorials.12_txt: 将机枪塔放在<font color = '#fcff00'>红圈内的空地</font>上。
tutorials.13_txt: 哈哈，本来出来打打秋风，没想到在这碰到条大鱼，兄弟们踏平前方的基地。
tutorials.14_txt: 还好已经建造了机枪塔，应该可以防住他们的攻击了。
tutorials.16_txt: 报告指挥官，在<font color = '#fcff00'>间谍卫星</font>中发现了敌方基地，攻打敌方基地可以拥有资源。
tutorials.39_txt: 把它放在红色圈内，指挥官。
tutorials.40_txt: 把它放在红色圈内，指挥官。
tutorials.51_txt: 牛逼！<font color = '#ff0000'>【点击“开始修复”修复受损建筑。】</font>
tutorials.91_txt: 找到了！他们在这里！我们先侦察一下他们的基地。
tutorials.92_txt: 他们连个机枪塔都没有，只有一些零散的部队。
tutorials.93_txt: 这么看来他们应该不是您的对手！点击<font color = '#fcff00'>“进攻”</font>。
tutorials.95_96_txt: 您的所有部队都显示在左边，选择想要投放的兵种。点击<font color = '#fcff00'>“一键派兵”</font>投放所有兵种。
tutorials.97_txt: 把您的部队部署在这，指挥官
tutorials.98_txt: 按住<font color = '#fcff00'>“鼠标左键”</font>可拖动屏幕界面，了解整个战场。
tutorials.98_1_txt: 进攻时可以对进攻兵种进行编队，<font color = '#ff0000'>【点击界面右侧的数字来进行编队吧！】</font>
tutorials.99_txt: 哈哈，敌人的基地防御太差了，消灭他们可以轻松拥有资源。
tutorials.100_txt: 您可以按住空格键的同时，来拖动鼠标进行圈选部队发动攻击。
tutorials.101_txt:
干得漂亮，指挥官！
点击<font color = '#fcff00'>“返回基地”</font>
tutorials.102_txt: 升级<font color = '#fcff00'>“油井”</font>可以提升油井的石油产量
tutorials.103_txt: 升级<font color = '#fcff00'>“金属冶炼厂”</font>可以提升金属冶炼厂的金属产量
tutorials.104_txt: 您的金属产量已经提升，请建造<font color = '#fcff00'>“金属仓库”</font>来容纳更多的金属。
tutorials.105_txt: 点击<font color = '#fcff00'>“立刻完成”</font>，可以瞬间完成建造或升级
tutorials.106_txt: 将金属仓库放在红圈内的空地上。
tutorials.107_txt: 您的石油产量已经提升，请建造<font color = '#fcff00'>“石油仓库”</font>来容纳更多的石油。
tutorials.108_txt: 将石油仓库放在红圈内的空地上。
tutorials.109_txt: 升级<font color = '#fcff00'>“发电厂”</font>可以增加电力生产
tutorials.110_txt: 兵营可以<font color = '#fcff00'>“生产各种兵种”</font>，增加基地的防御与攻击
tutorials.111_txt: 生产一个步枪兵试试兵营的生产能力吧！
tutorials.112_txt: 点击<font color = '#fcff00'>“完成”</font>可以加快兵种的生产速度。
tutorials.113_txt: 建造<font color = '#fcff00'>“爱国者导弹”</font>可以增加基地对地防御能力。
tutorials.114_txt: 将爱国者导弹放在红圈内的空地上。
tutorials.115_txt: 建造<font color = '#fcff00'>“步兵训练营”</font>可以升级更高级兵种。
tutorials.116_txt: 将步兵训练营放在红圈内的空地上。
tutorials.117_txt: 您的资源已生产，点击<font color = '#fcff00'>“全部收取”</font>收获资源。
tutorials.169_txt: 您已经完成了基本的基地建筑，现在快跟着任务提示扩充基地强壮自己吧！

ranks.2_rubi: 看看你，指挥官！这是你人生中第一次升职！
ranks.5_rubi: 你在踏踏实实的升官，指挥官。他们说一等兵是最好的兵！
ranks.8_rubi: 你一定觉得自己很特别，指挥官，就像你的军衔一样。
ranks.11_rubi: 他们说判定一个男人是不是纯爷们，看的就是他肩膀上有多少条纹！你现在已经不只一条了！加油！
ranks.14_rubi: 又升级了？你刚入伍的那个景象还历历在目！
ranks.17_rubi: 太棒了，指挥官。掌握权力的感觉如何？
ranks.20_rubi: 你绝对是你领地上的掌门人，指挥官，你的军衔已经证明了一切。
ranks.23_rubi: 你绝对是你领地上的掌门人，指挥官，你的军衔已经证明了一切。
ranks.26_rubi: 你的权力正在不断增长，指挥官。终有一天，你会拥有肩膀上的所有斜纹和星星，我敢保证。
ranks.29_rubi: 你的表现令我十分感动，指挥官。你已经在斜纹家族毕业了，现在开始是金属质的横条！
ranks.32_rubi: 实现了别人梦寐以求的理想是一件令人骄傲的事情，指挥官。你对肩膀上的军衔骄傲吗？
ranks.35_rubi: 噢，上尉，我的上尉啊！二战电影里叫上尉的都是令人尊敬的人物！
ranks.38_rubi: 这朵娇嫩的菊花正好证明了你是一个不好对付的敌人，对吗？
ranks.41_rubi: 好消息是你通往总司令的道路已经走到一半了，坏消息是你还有一半要走。
ranks.44_rubi: 就像你肩膀上的那只雄鹰一样，你的翅膀是时候该石更了！
ranks.47_rubi: 终于拥有“将”这个头衔了，指挥官。你的付出开始得到回报了！
ranks.49_rubi: “准”字去掉了，你现在正式进入将军的行列了，指挥官。牛逼吗？
ranks.51_rubi: 你的进程令我十分满意，指挥官。你的能力超出了我的预期。
ranks.53_rubi: 随着你肩膀上的星星不断增加，你的权力也在一起增长！过不了多久你将会是世界上权力最大的男人。
ranks.55_rubi: 五颗星星是杰出的人专属的符号，指挥官。而你绝对无愧于杰出这个形容词！
ranks.57_rubi: 你应该感到无上的荣耀，指挥官。你已经拥有了世界上最大的权力。站在世界巅峰的感觉如何？

buildings.building56_description: 英雄中心可以招募强大的英雄来助战，升级英雄中心可以增加部署英雄的数量。
buildings.building57_description: 战争就意味着血和铁，没有铁壁如何经受敌人无情的攻击。建造完毕，增加英雄血量。
buildings.building17_description: 使用沙袋来巩固您的基地，保护主要建筑物并为敌人设置障碍。您可以升级沙袋为混凝土和金属。
buildings.building1_description: 金属冶炼厂冶炼出的金属可用于生产军队和建筑
buildings.building2_description: 油井中挖掘出的石油可用于生产军队和建筑
buildings.building19_description: 零散的敌军很容易被作战演习室的诱饵勾引而攻击您的基地。我们利用他们来检验您的防御是否稳固。当您需要停止的时候可以随时让他们撤退。
buildings.building60_description: 法国巨炮为火力强大的究极的对陆防御单位，能有效防卫基地，抵御地面坦克部队的攻击。（不攻击步兵）
buildings.building60_description2: 法国巨炮为火力强大的究极的对陆防御固定守卫单位。
buildings.building3_description: 金属仓库储存金属以便需要时使用。升级后的金属仓库可储存更多金属。
buildings.building47_description: 意大利的标志建筑之一。比萨斜塔从地基到塔顶高58.36米，从地面到塔顶高55米。建造完成后，增加士兵血量。
buildings.building33_description: Defend your base with the Long Range Strike Tower. Upgraded Towers produce advanced projectiles that unleash hell on enemy terrain.
buildings.building4_description: 石油仓库储存石油以便需要时使用。升级后的石油仓库可储存更多石油。
buildings.building20_description: 爱国者对地导弹向空中射出爆炸物并像雨一样下在进攻者身上。升级可增加射程，伤害及生命值。
buildings.building61_description: 陷阱制造厂可以生产静止陷阱和爆炸陷阱，是防御基地的明智之选。
buildings.building48_description: 法国标志。1889年建成位于法国巴黎战神广场上的镂空结构铁塔，总高324米。是世界建筑史上的技术杰作。建造完成后，增加士兵攻击。
buildings.building5_description: 生产可以遍布整个基地的地雷
buildings.building34_description: The Repair Shop repairs units PLACEHOLDER
buildings.building21_description: 机枪塔切断敌人的战线。升级可增加射程，伤害及生命值
buildings.building6_description: 发电厂为基地的所有行动，生产，防御提供源源不断的能量。
buildings.building49_description: 英国伦敦著名古钟。英国国会会议厅附属的钟楼，建于1859年。建造完成后，增加飞机血量。
buildings.building22_description: 步兵的作战非常依赖掩体，而机枪碉堡则为他们提供了一个绝佳的据点。升级可增加军队容量和防御力。
buildings.building50_description: 是法国在1876年赠送给美国的独立100周年礼物。自由女神像高46米，重200多吨。建造完成，增加飞机攻击。
buildings.building23_description: Laser Cannons' high intensity laser beams devastate both vehicles and planes. Upgrade the Laser Cannon to improve its range, damage and health.
buildings.building9_description: 从报废的战车中回收资源
buildings.building51_description: 紧依克里姆林宫墙，是莫斯科的中央广场。十月革命后，成为原苏联庆祝重要节日的地方。完成之后，增加坦克血量。
buildings.building24_description: Enemy troops may tread lightly, but they can't escape explosions. Once triggered, Light Mines deal large damage. Place these at choke points and near important buildings to bring death at enemy footfall.
buildings.building10_description: Gives you the ability to quickly modify your base layout.
buildings.building52_description: 德国国会大厦位于柏林市中心，体现了古典式、哥特式、文艺复兴式和巴洛克式的多种建筑风格。完成之后，增加坦克攻击。
buildings.building25_description: Tesla Coils exterminate enemy vehicles by emitting disabling high voltage electric pulses. Upgrade the Tesla Coil to improve its range, disable time and health.
buildings.building11_description: The War Room is where intelligence data is analyzed post-recon, the hard calls are made and ideal strike locations are determined. Upgrade the War Room to extend your battlefield front, increasing your sphere of influence.
buildings.building53_description: 应用光棱科技的新型防御塔，可以轻易消灭单个地面单位。相邻的光棱塔可以连锁攻击，威力更大。
buildings.building26_description: 新型的步兵部队在兵营中投入训练前均来自于步兵训练营的研发。升级以研发更高级的兵种。
buildings.building13_description: 飞机和直升机均在空指部生产。升级以提升生产速度。
buildings.building55_description: 战车控制器可以俘虏来犯敌军的坦克（特殊兵种除外），可以销毁也可以变为已方坦克，但只限玩家之间正常基地战中使用。
buildings.building42_description: 配件中心可以获得武器配件，激活后增加相应的属性。升级配件中心可以同时激活更多的配件。
buildings.building41_description: <font color = '#FFCC00'>VIP专享特权</font>，即日起在红警大战VIP生效内可花费勋章进行建造。
buildings.building14_description: 指挥中心是基地中所有活动的核心。升级后可以解锁新的建筑，升级现有建筑，增强防御力量以及提升资源生产速度。
buildings.building43_description: 佯攻对地导弹可以混淆敌人的视听，为掩护爱国者对地导弹而做出贡献。
buildings.building29_description: 步兵单位从兵营中训练。升级以提升生产速度。
buildings.building59_description: 战争学院可以激活和学习6种战略，并可解锁和学习学院技能，增强作战能力。
buildings.building30_description: 战车工厂可量产战车单位。升级以提升生产速度。
buildings.building44_description: 佯攻机枪塔可以混淆敌人的视听，为掩护机枪塔而做出贡献。
buildings.building58_description: 要么敌人踏着我们的尸体过去，要么我们踏着敌人的尸体过去！建造完毕，增加英雄攻击。
buildings.building45_description: 拥有战俘营后，可以对其他玩家进行占领操作。
buildings.building31_description: 作战实验室研发新型的战车和飞机。升级以研发更高级的战车和飞机。
buildings.building46_description: 征战大本营，可以对兵种进行治疗与遣散，升级可增加集团军营人口。
buildings.building64_description: 军备研究所可以制造军备，装配后获得相应属性。升级军备研究所可以装配更多军备。
buildings.building66_description: 植树节招募令活动实景树

units.unit2_description: 装备G36突击步枪，步枪兵的任务都是指挥官指派的最苦最累的活。
units.unit3_description: 机枪兵是装备了轻型装甲和重型MAG 60.20机枪的步兵。他们喜欢近距离作战，并快速击杀步兵和轻型装甲战车。
units.unit4_description: 炮兵携带瑞典MBT-LAW反坦克导弹在战场上攻击和摧毁装甲运载工具。
units.unit5_description: 喷火兵是一群喜欢“玩火“的家伙，他们携带着美国M2-2火焰喷射器可以轻易地对付成群结队的步兵。
units.unit6_description: 对敌人来说，他们是隐形的，即使距离敌人非常的近。狙击手使用美国萨维奇公司生产的M110BA狙击步枪在安全距离内可以快速而残忍的击杀目标。
units.unit7_description: 捆绑着炸弹的爆破兵，唯一能够实现的攻击手段就是冲向敌人的作战单位和建筑物并引爆炸弹与敌人同归于尽。
units.unit8_description: 工程师在战斗中的任务就是修复损毁的运载工具。
units.unit9_description: 医生可以在战场上医疗受伤的步兵。
units.unit10_description: 轻型履带车是一种装备了美国海军最新型M60E4机枪的中型无人驾驶迷你装甲坦克。
units.unit11_description: 火箭越野车装备了70多枚蜥蜴火箭炮弹，它可以快速灵活地打击目标。
units.unit12_description: 装备有M2重机枪中型装甲车，它的50毫米口径机枪射速可以达到1200发/分钟。
units.unit13_description: 用来发射BGM-71“陶氏”反坦克导弹的导弹发射车，在安全距离内可以进行中距离的导弹范围攻击。
units.unit14_description: 不要轻视这种轻型坦克，灰熊坦克是装备了30毫米口径L21加农炮的中型装甲坦克。它可以轻易地击毁轻型装甲车辆。
units.unit15_description: 犀牛坦克就是战场中的野兽。它装备的120毫米口径的主炮可以对重型装甲坦克造成巨大的打击。
units.unit16_description: 坦克杀手行动迟缓，但是它配备的重型装甲和128毫米主炮射出的具有高爆性的炮弹足以让您忽略它的缺点。
units.unit17_description: 光棱坦克实在短距离进行攻击的中型装甲坦克。他们的高能激光武器可以烧毁任何在它攻击范围内的作战单位。
units.unit18_description: 防空炮装备有8.8厘米高射加农炮，用他们来攻击飞行作战单位，场面就如同下雨一般壮观。
units.unit19_description: 干扰发射机使用脉冲信号来干扰目标单位发射导弹，它可以快速而大面积地释放等离子信号阻止目标作战单位发射导弹。
units.unit20_description: 拦截机的主要任务是拦截空中的导弹和其他攻击。
units.unit21_description: 二战时德国曾计划建造的装备有C/34战列舰主炮的天启坦克。这种作战单位是无敌的，也是地面上最大的作战单位。
units.unit22_description: 入侵者战机就是“空中的火箭越野车”，它同样装备了70多枚蜥蜴火箭炮弹。
units.unit23_description: 武装直升机装备了L86 LSW机枪，它可以深入敌人内部进行中距离攻击。
units.unit24_description: 夜鹰直升机是装备了MG3机枪的轻型武装直升机。它可以机动灵活地对地面步兵群进行扫射攻击。
units.unit25_description: UH-60黑鹰直升机是装备了AGM-114地狱火反坦克导弹的重型武装直升机。
units.unit26_description: 雷霆战机是一种轻型攻击飞机，它可以快速而猛烈地攻击目标。
units.unit27_description: 黑鹰战机的攻击方式是近地飞行并使用机枪扫射和导弹轰炸地面作战单位。
units.unit28_description: 恐怖机器人装备了MK-8机甲，并使用XM18迷你手枪和25毫米榴弹发射器。拥有了它，您就可以主宰整个战场。
units.unit29_description: 虎式攻击机拥有凶猛的火力和厚实的装甲，一旦有了它的支持，我们将横扫整个战场！
units.unit44_description: 空中堡垒具有令人望尘莫及的远程续航能力和令人生畏的大载弹能力。地毯式轰炸将主宰整个战场的走向！
units.unit46_description: 本来容易被遗弃的灰熊，穿上了黄金圣衣之后也是战场一霸！
units.unit47_description: 作为战场中的野兽，现在更加牛逼了！
units.unit48_description: 披上黄金圣衣之后，它成了名符其实的坦克杀手！
units.unit49_description: 坦克之王，披上黄金圣衣的它绝对能主宰整个战场！
units.unit51_description: 披上圣诞华装的它绝对能在战场上给您带来欢乐！
units.unit53_description: 持续攻击可以一直冰封
units.unit45_description: 作为火炮之王，敌人的陆地与空中目标，皆可被猛犸摧毁。猛犸坦克是战场的主宰，是战场上最后的幸存者。
units.unit54_description: 坦克中的帝王，一次发射2发炮弹，火力极为强悍，是重型坦克中的王者。
units.unit79_description: T-90主战坦克的特殊性能使其在摧城拔寨时的表现无人能及，但与此同时，它面对敌方坦克时的表现就不那么尽如人意了。
units.unit90_description: 强悍的防御能力，强大的对抗能力，被誉为新一代陆战霸主。
units.unit91_description: 强悍的防御能力，强大的对抗能力，被誉为新一代陆战霸主。
units.unit92_description: 强悍的防御能力，强大的对抗能力，被誉为新一代陆战霸主。
units.unit97_description: 完全体的天启坦克，启用了最新型的双152炮和四履带设计，更加强悍的攻防能力和更高的速度使其在征战和基地战中有更好的表现。
units.unit111_description: 是天启类坦克的最新改进型，使用的是125毫米48倍径滑膛坦克炮。其双向稳定装置为2E42M型，身管之上覆盖有热护套。安装了先进的火控系统和多种光电技术的应用，加上先进的计算机，红外等高新技术的车裁设备，使火力反应时间更短，打击精度更高，生存能力更强。

quests.q8_rubi_pre: 指挥官，您对基地的改善令人刮目相看，但我依然觉得我们的防御可以更强。建造爱国者对地导弹会很有效。
quests.q8_rubi_post: 我觉得导弹发射的瞬间喷出的烟雾非常壮观，您不觉得吗？
quests.q54_rubi_pre: 黑鹰不仅仅是一种猛禽，准确的说，它是站在食物链最顶端的王者
quests.q20_hint: 在军事建筑的弹窗中找到作战实验室。
quests.q23_rubi_pre: 指挥官，尽管我也比较中意大型武器和战车，但我依然建议从轻型履带车开始研发。
quests.q30_hint: 在基地周围寻找报废车辆
quests.q28_rubi_pre: 我爱火焰，指挥官。火焰中的华丽，火光，不可预知性，热量……光是想想我都兴奋得全身颤抖。我认为是时候解锁喷火兵了。
quests.q54_rubi_post: 天空是我们的了，指挥官。现在没有人能阻止我们。
quests.q20_rubi_pre: 进化的时间到了，指挥官。车轮是人类最伟大的发明之一，如此简洁却又如此万能。建造作战实验室能让您研发战车，以发挥车轮的伟大作用。
quests.q23_rubi_post: 是时候上路了，指挥官。看看这些轻型履带车能造成多大的破坏力吧。.
quests.q14_rubi_post: 太完美了，指挥官！很快我们的敌人就会屈服于我们的力量之下！
quests.q30_rubi_pre: 基地旁边的环境就像一座宝库。您根本不知道在这些报废车辆身上能淘出多少宝贝来！
quests.q20_rubi_post: 战车对战场的影响有那么多可能性，指挥官，我们应该从哪开始？
quests.q61_rubi_post: 天，您可真是社交名人，不是吗，指挥官？

quests.q35_rubi_pre: 指挥官，我能跟您聊聊吗？我感觉我要的你给不了我……我不是在责备您。没有开口索取是我的错，所以，我现在向您提出，能不能升级指挥中心？
quests.q46_rubi_pre: 指挥官，我需要对我的中央核心处理器进行一些修改——一些很小的修修补补，如果您愿意帮忙的话。但是如果没有一个训练有素的工程学专家，我无法完成这个工作。

quests.q57_rubi_pre: 指挥官，您一直自己玩不觉得无聊吗？找个朋友跟您一起玩吧！

quests.q42_rubi_pre: 指挥官，在我的分析中，您的军队里没有什么能造成比爆破兵的自杀性突袭更有效地伤害输出了。我觉得您应该把这些疯子……我是说……虔诚的殉道者投入战场。
quests.q61_description: 邀请朋友来玩红色警戒
quests.q18_rubi_pre: 您现有的发电厂根本无法满足我的需要，指挥官。再造一座，以让我们都能获得提升。
quests.q12_rubi_post: 干得好，指挥官。现在您的军队的智商已经可以秒杀同级了。但很可惜他们不可能变得像我RUBI一样聪明。
quests.q37_hint: 在防御建筑中找到机枪碉堡。
quests.q32_rubi_pre: 指挥官，有个办法可以大大减少您的军队在战场上的无谓牺牲，让医生跟着他们去保证没错。
quests.q18_rubi_post: 很好，指挥官！您应该随时留意您的能源供给，以确保您的基地能发挥它完整的功能。
quests.q33_rubi_post: 这些防空车应该对您的统治有所帮助，而且应该会让您觉得自己更重要吧，指挥官。
quests.q48_hint: 在步兵训练营中解锁狙击手
quests.q27_rubi_pre: 指挥官，为了基地的安全，更强大的军队是必要的。升级步兵训练营，您就可以训练更多种类的军队
quests.q48_rubi_pre: 指挥官，我一直想要更致命，更静谧的战士。比如那些能在安全距离外有效执行任务的……我们是不是应该解锁狙击手了？
quests.q59_description: 邀请一个朋友来玩红色警戒
quests.q48_rubi_post: 指挥官，狙击手已经可以训练了。像他们这样的冷血杀人机器是我的最爱。
quests.q4_rubi_pre: 指挥官，金属和石油是我们这个世界的货币。幸运的是，您的基地已经在生产它们了。您需要做的只有动动手指头把它们收集起来。
quests.q59_hint: 点击 "邀请好友" 并让您的朋友安装红色警戒
quests.q57_hint: 点击 "邀请好友"并让您的朋友安装红色警戒
quests.q32_rubi_post: 您温柔的爱抚可以使任何人的伤口痊愈，指挥官。这些懂得医术高明的的魔术师在战斗中将会非常有帮助
quests.q11_hint: 单击油井并收集2500个单位的石油
quests.q59_rubi_pre: 如果我们有法律，那我不和您的朋友分享我的美丽和智慧将会是一种犯罪。很确定的说，您还有其他朋友可以邀请的，指挥官。
quests.q27_rubi_post: 在您知道之前，您将会拥有世界上最先进的军队，指挥官。
quests.q60_description: 邀请一个朋友来玩红色警戒
quests.q59_rubi_post: 妙极了，指挥官。我喜欢奉献者，越多越好。
quests.q61_hint: 点击 "邀请好友"并让他们安装红色警戒
quests.q53_hint: 在作战实验室中解锁坦克杀手
quests.q29_hint: 选择发电厂并点击 "升级"
quests.q57_description: 邀请一个朋友来玩红色警戒
quests.q45_rubi_post: 很好，指挥官。这些野兽会像践踏大草原一样践踏您的敌人。
quests.q53_rubi_pre: 来自大地的挑战需要一台配得上它的战车，指挥官。
quests.q29_rubi_pre: 并不是只有您需要更多的能源，指挥官。升级您的发电厂。
quests.q11_rubi_pre: 指挥官，很高兴的告诉你，我的核心已经完成了必要的修复。但这些新造的金属让我的身体有一点紧，能不能给我点石油让我放松一下？
quests.q17_hint: 点击指挥中心并选择 "升级"
quests.q40_hint: 在作战实验室中解锁V3火箭车
quests.q29_rubi_post: 啊，世界上没什么比核战掀起的风浪更迷人的景色了……
quests.q53_rubi_post: 太强悍了，指挥官。我对现在的军备水平充满了信心，没有什么任务是我们完成不了的。
quests.q40_rubi_pre: 您总是需要更多的火力，指挥官。V3火箭车能让您的火力上升一个档次，更快速的消灭敌人。
quests.q57_rubi_post: 看，这样是不是好多了，指挥官？有个同伴多么温馨。
quests.q40_rubi_post: 我嫉妒您的战车，指挥官。他们可以像所有机器想做的那样飞奔，但我不能。
quests.q7_hint: 点击您的金属冶炼厂和油井然后选择 "升级."
quests.q50_rubi_pre: 指挥官，您的空军可以拥有更多同僚。也许您可以考虑解锁夜鹰直升机？
quests.q61_rubi_pre: 您一定很受欢迎，指挥官。您确定您没有忘记邀请任何人？
quests.q41_hint: 在作战实验室中解锁入侵者战机
quests.q6_hint: 在兵营中生产5个步枪兵
quests.q38_hint: 在防御建筑中找到地雷工厂
quests.q13_hint: 在步兵训练营中解锁炮兵
quests.q13_rubi_post: 妙极了，指挥官。我最喜欢看到火箭炮爆炸的样子了。
quests.q11_rubi_post: 谢谢您给我的润滑油，用句人类的土话说，我现在老爽了
quests.q22_rubi_post: 这些车子会带您去任何地方，指挥官。很遗憾我不能跟您一起走，但我很乐意继续管理您的基地，真的。
quests.q13_rubi_pre: 指挥官，如果您希望能在面对流氓混混的时候更稳固的守住自己的基地，您将需要更强的火力。我能建议您解锁炮兵吗？
quests.q3_description: 建造金属仓库和石油仓库
quests.q6_rubi_post: 干得好，指挥官！您正逐步成为世界上最致命的武装力量。
quests.q1_rubi_post: 这是个很好的开始，指挥官！一把强力的枪，对任何人都非常重要，您不觉得吗？
quests.q6_rubi_pre: 指挥官，一个强大的领导背后都有一支强力的部队。是时候建立属于您的了。
quests.q3_hint: 点击 "建造" 中的"资源"菜单，建造金属仓库和石油仓库
quests.q50_rubi_post: 有了这些美人的协助，您的军队就像毒蛇一样致命，指挥官。
quests.q7_description: 升级您的金属冶炼厂和油井到2级
quests.q8_hint: 在防御建筑中找到爱国者对地导弹
quests.q37_rubi_pre: 指挥官，您的防卫军队就像案板上的肉一样任人宰割。如果您建造机枪碉堡，那必然能给他们更强的保障，而且能显著提高防御能力。
quests.q7_rubi_post: 这是我喜欢的，指挥官。一个知道如何扩张自己资产的男人。
quests.q3_rubi_post: 太完美了，指挥官！您为我们的未来进行了一次可靠的投资！
quests.q3_rubi_pre: 指挥官，谢谢您把我从那些禽兽的魔掌中拯救出来。虽说从技术上说我不可能得到真正的自由，但我相信我们之间的关系会比我之前的主人更可靠。首先，您需要一些设施来储存您的资源。
quests.q54_hint: 在作战实验室中解锁黑鹰战机
quests.q14_hint: 点击一个机枪塔并选择 "升级"
quests.q63_description: 关注【红警大战】认证空间
quests.q63_hint: 进入【红警大战】认证空间，点击“关注”。
quests.q63_rubi_pre: 关注【红警大战】认证空间，第一时间了解红警最新讯息。进入【红警大战】认证空间，在页面上方点击“关注”按钮，成功关注，“开启”按钮将变为“收取”按钮，点击收取即可获取奖励。
quests.q63_rubi_post: 已关注，可直接点击“收取”按钮，获取奖励。

game.acad_confirmcancel: Are you sure you want to stop #v1#'s training?

You can not upgrade this Academy as it's currently training.

game.acad_stream_description: We have the technology. Better. Stronger. Faster.
game.acad_stream_title: Behold! #fname#'s #v1# has graduated from the Monster Academy and is now level #v2#.
game.acad_tut_1:
Welcome to the Monster Academy
The Monster Academy trains your monsters to be more effective in battle.
game.acad_tut_2: Use the arrows to select which monster you'd like to train.
game.acad_tut_3: Each Academy can only train one monster species at a time. However, you can always build more than one Monster Academy!
game.acad_tut_4:
Once a monster has completed training, all Monsters of that species will be upgraded.
Start Training!
game.ai_abunakki_description: Known for their savagery, the Abunakki wear the bones of their enemies as jewelry.
game.ai_abunakki_fail: Your attack failed. Raise a new army and attack them again before they start repairing!
game.ai_abunakki_succ: It'll be a long time before the Abunakki Tribe thinks about messing with you again.
game.ai_abunakki_succstream: #fname# just destroyed an Abunakki monster base. Known for their savagery, the Abunakki tribe wear the bones of their enemies as jewelry.
game.ai_abunakki_taunt: We'll be back for your bones!
game.ai_dread_description: The Dreadnauts utilize advanced technology and science to build superior weaponry.
game.ai_dread_fail: Your attack failed. Raise a new army and attack them again before they start repairing!
game.ai_dread_succ: It'll be a long time before the Dreadnaut Tribe thinks about messing with you again.
game.ai_dread_succstream: #fname# just destroyed a Dreadnaut monster base. The Dreadnaut tribe utilize advanced technology and science to build superior weaponry.
game.ai_kozu_description: The Kozu tribe utilize exalted masonry to construct master mazes to defend their bases.
game.ai_kozu_fail: Your attack failed. Raise a new army and attack them again before they start repairing!
game.ai_kozu_succ: It'll be a long time before the Kozu Tribe thinks about messing with you again.
game.ai_kozu_succstream: #fname# just destroyed a Kozu monster base. The Kozu tribe utilize exalted masonry to construct master mazes to defend their bases.
game.ai_kozu_taunt: The source of our power is a secret.
game.ai_legion_description: The Legionnaires are keen military tacticians and are well-known for their unwavering valor in battle.
game.ai_legion_fail: Your attack failed. Raise a new army and attack them again before they start repairing!
game.ai_legion_succ: It'll be a long time before the Legionnaire Tribe thinks about messing with you again.
game.ai_legion_succstream: #fname# just destroyed a Legionnaire monster base. The Legionnaire tribe are keen military tacticians and are well-known for their unwavering valor in battle.
game.ai_trojan_trap:
It was a trap!
Who didn't see that coming?
game.ai_trojan_letter:
Dear #v1#,
Too much needless blood has been spilled on our yards. It is time we let our monsters live out the rest of their days in peace.

Let this be known as Armistice Day! As a token of our sincerity, please accept this wooden memorial.
game.ai_trojan_headline: Wild Monsters left you a note pinned to a large wooden structure.
game.ai_gooddefense: You successfully defended your base from an attack by the #v1# Tribe
game.ai_gooddefense_streamtitle: Boo-Ya! #fname# successfully defended their base against the #v1# Wild Monster Tribe.
game.ai_poordefense_tb: You took some damage in that attack
game.ai_poordefense_tc: Build some defensive towers and traps to better defend your base from looters and attackers.
game.attack_gooddefense: You successfully defended your base from an attack by #v1#
game.attack_gooddefense_streamtitle: #fname# successfully defended their base from an attack by #v1#.
game.attack_taunt_streambody: Your defenses were no match for my dominant invasion.
game.attack_msg_attackover: Attack over, click the 'End Attack' button at the bottom of the screen to return to your yard.
game.attack_log_downedlooted: A level #v1# #v2# was knocked down. #v1# of the banked resources were looted.
game.attack_log_downed_repaircancel: A level #v1# #v2# was knocked down. Cancelling the repair.
game.attack_log_downed_buildcancel: A level #v1# #v2# was knocked down while building. Construction has been stopped!
game.attack_log_downed_upgradecancel: A level #v1# #v2# was knocked down while upgrading to level #v3#.
game.bait_tut_1: The Wild Monster Baiter (WMB), which sprays a intoxicating Monster Musk, attracts Wild Monsters and allows players to test their defenses.
game.bait_tut_2: Select the direction of the test attack by clicking the arrows.
game.bait_tut_3: Click the "+" and "-" buttons to add or remove monsters from the attack. You can hold them down to add more than one at a time.
game.bait_tut_4: Press the "Start Spraying" button to begin.
game.bait_tut_5: Monster Musk refills gradually over time, but can be immediately replenished in the General Store.
game.bait_tut_6: Upgrading the Wild Monster Baiter increases the capacity for attacks.

game.boobytrap_desc: Invisible to the enemy until it is too late. Triggered when a Monster steps on it, deals large damage to a small area. Place close to buildings or use walls with gaps to group attackers into a small space.

2.设定后，间谍卫星中会出现与敌对国的基地。
3.每天只能进行一次敌对国设定。

game.cannontower_desc: Short range but high damage, this towers shells explode on impact, great for taking out tightly-packed groups.
game.catapult_desc: A siege weapon, the #b_catapult# hurls #r_twig# at enemy bases to damage buildings. Upgrade to increase firepower
game.cloc_err_cantupgrade: Building is unlocking the #v1#. You must wait for this to finish or cancel it before you can upgrade
game.cloc_err_cantrecycle: Are you sure you want to recycle this building? This can not be undone and will cancel the unlocking of the #v1#
game.cloc_upgrade_streamtitle: #fname#'s Monster Locker has been upgraded to Level #v1#
game.flinger_desc: Flings your monsters into battle! This building is required if you wish to attack another player. Use the #b_maproom# to find and target enemy yards.
game.generalstore_desc: Spend your Shiny on time saving upgrades.
game.goofactory_desc: Produces #r_goos#. #r_goos# is used in the #b_hatchery# to produce monsters.
game.hwn_visit: Visit your backyard on Halloween and click the Giant Pumpkin for a special surprise!
game.hwn_mini_title: Your Daily Pumpkin, Wheel of Trick or Treats
game.hwn_treat_body: A new mini-pumpkin will grow in your yard each day between now and Halloween.
game.hat_damaged: Hatchery more than 50% damaged Repair to continue production.
game.hat_headline: Goo goes in, monsters come out!
game.hat_needgoo: Production paused Not enough Goo to start.
game.hat_needhousing: Production paused, Not enough room in your Housing.
game.hat_producing_message: Select monsters from below to add to the queue.
game.hat_queuefull: Queue is full; click slots to remove monsters or wait.
game.hat_tut_1: Hatcheries convert Goo into monsters. Building more than one Hatchery allows you to produce monsters faster.
game.hat_tut_2: Click on a monster to start production. Clicking on a monster multiple times continues to add them to the queue.
game.hat_tut_3: Purchasing the "Hatchery Overdrive" in the General Store dramatically speeds up overall monster production time.
game.hatchery_desc: Converts #r_goos# produced by the #b_goofactory# into the creatures you have unlocked in the #b_monsterlocker#
game.hcc_desc: Control all of your Hatcheries from a single building. You add monsters to one build queue and it sends instructions to whichever Hatchery becomes available first.
game.hcc_headline: One building to rule them all
game.hcc_space_description:
Housing space
Add monsters to the queue until the housing space gets used up.
game.hcc_tut_1:
Welcome to the HCC.
This building gives you control over all your Hatcheries. It also allows you to see when your housing will be full so you better plan your monster army.
game.hcc_tut_2: Moving your mouse over a monster tells you all about it.
game.hcc_tut_3: Clicking on a monster adds it to the queue. Each queue slot can hold up to 20 monsters, allowing you to have a total of 140 monsters queued up at any time.
game.hcc_tut_4: The monster in the first queue slot will be sent to whichever Hatchery becomes available first.
game.hcc_tut_5: If you click on a monster in the queue or in a Hatchery it will be removed / canceled.
game.hcc_tut_6: You can see how much space you have in your Monster Housing and how much space the monsters in the queue will take up when finished.
game.hcc_tut_7: You can add more monsters to the queue than your housing can hold. They'll just wait in the Hatcheries for more housing space to become available.
game.hcc_tut_8: If the HCC is knocked down in an attack all production will stop, so keep it well protected!
game.housing_desc: Stores the creatures you produce in the #b_hatchery#, upgrade or build more to increase capacity.
game.lasertower_desc: Deadly and fast, this plasma energy tower zaps any invading enemy at the speed of light.
game.mail_nomessages: You have no messages. Send some to your friends!
game.map_msg_damaged: Your Map Room is more than 50% damaged from an attack, please repair it to gain access.
game.map_msg_notbuilt: You need to build a "Map Room" first, click on "Buildings" at the bottom.
game.map_msg_disabled:
MapRoom Disabled
We're just updating the Map Room and while it updates we've disabled access to it. Please check back in a few minutes.
game.map_msg_attackconfirm: Are you sure you want to attack #v1#?
game.map_msg_attackfriend: 您不是开玩笑吧？！你真的打算进攻#v1#？我想我们是盟军。
game.map_msg_attackingdisabled:
禁止攻击 - 等待游戏更新
我们即将更新游戏！游戏更新有时候会引发一些错误，因此我们已经停止了攻击系统的使用。
game.map_msg_dp: #v1#暂时处于被保护状态中，请您稍后再来进攻吧。
game.map_msg_superQG: #v1#正在基地中巡查，是否使用并消耗一个超级强攻令向对方发起宣战？（向对方宣战，对方有1分钟回复时间，1分钟内未回复宣战，则视为接受，系统会强制对方下线，并在1分钟内无法登入游戏）
game.map_msg_flingerdamaged: Your Flinger is more than 50% damaged and cannot function, please repair to resume flinging.
game.map_msg_flingerupgrading: Your Flinger is upgrading and can't be used to fling monsters until it is finished.
game.map_msg_higherlevelconfirm:
You can attack #v1# but the're a higher level than you and your monsters will have a tough time overpowering their defenses.

Also, if you do attack them, they'll have the ability to retaliate. Chances are they will destroy your base. Your call, but don't say we didn't warn you!
game.map_msg_inprogress: #v1#正在遭到#v2#的攻击！请稍后再来！
game.map_msg_leveltoolow: 您不能攻击他，因为他的等级太低。公平起见，试试寻找与自己实力相当的对手吧！
game.map_msg_needflinger: You need to build a Flinger to fling your Monsters into an enemy yard. You can find the Flinger under 'Special Structures'
game.map_msg_nomonsters: You have no units available, please train some in the Barracks, War Factory or Airfield.
game.map_msg_ownerinyard: #v1# is currently at their base. Try attacking later when the coast is clear.
game.map_msg_protection:
WARNING - You are protected for #v1#

Attacking anyone will remove your protection and leave you open to attacks from others.
game.map_msg_sp: #v1#像菜鸟一样被保护起来了。他会一直处于保护状态，直到超过保护期或者他按耐不住蠢蠢欲动的心去主动攻击其他人。
game.map_msg_truceactive: 您和#v1#正处于休战状态，这意味着您不能攻击他，他也不能攻击您。
game.map_msg_vengeance:
通常情况下，您不能攻击比您等级低的玩家，但是他却不知天高地厚的主动的挑衅您，指挥官！

我们允许您反击同样的次数来教训教训他。俗话说“君子报仇十年不晚。”
game.map_status_attackCount: 攻击同一玩家次数太多，请休息后再来！
game.map_status_offlinetime1: 下线倒计时（可使用强攻令）
game.map_trucemessage: 请接受我的停战请求吧，我们可以阻止这不必要的流血冲突。
game.map_truceaccept_streamtitle: 我已经同意了和#v1#的停战协议。
game.map_truceaccept_streambody: 我们终于看到战争结束了！
game.QG_msg: 本次强攻将消耗1个强攻令，拥有num%个强攻令，是否确定强攻？
game.QG_tip: 对不起！您没有强攻令，不能强攻。
game.recordWarning: 该功能尚未开启，敬请期待!
game.exp_dec:
1、玩家在游戏中的数据会经过统计展现给玩家，有助于玩家获得更好的游戏体验
2、当玩家的某项战绩达到或超过限定值后，会获得相应奖杯荣誉
3、奖杯共分成7种：铁质奖杯、铜质奖杯、银质奖杯、黄金奖杯、白金奖杯、钻石奖杯和黄钻奖杯，奖杯等级逐级递升
4、玩家的每一项战绩都会与自己好友的战绩相比较后进行排名，数值高的玩家排名靠前
5、玩家的战绩会实时进行更新，好友排名中的战绩每小时更新一次
game.score_cantOpen: 玩家6级之后可查看战绩
game.maproom_desc: Look around the world, find and help friends and select other players yards to attack.
game.mh_capacity_desc: Capacity of all your Houses combined
game.mh_footer_desc: Want to remove some monsters to make room for others? Send them into battle using the Flinger and Map Room or build the Monster Juicer found in the Buildings section of the build menu to turn unused monsters back into Goo.
game.mh_juicefooter_desc: Want to Juice some Monsters? Select the ones you want to add to the Juicer from the list above.
game.mh_headline: Holds the monsters produced by the Hatchery.
game.mkting_academy_body: Pump your Monsters full of steroids and build the Monster Academy to increase their Health, Damage and Speed.
game.mkting_catapult_body: Fling Twigs and Pebbles at your enemies and crush their defenses before you send in your Monsters.
game.mkting_fillapult_body: Bank and top-off your resources to increase the size and damage of your Catapult.
game.mkting_hcc_body: Build a Hatchery Control Center to manage production of all your monsters.
game.mkting_laser_body: Build a Laser Tower to quickly dispatch tight groups of monsters.
game.mkting_silo_body: Build more Storage Silos to hold more resources.
game.mkting_siloupgrade_body: You have a Storage Silo that can be upgraded. Upgrade it now to store more resources.
game.mkting_tesla_body: Tesla towers have excellent range and are can easily takedown stronger monsters.
game.mkting_overdrive_body: Overdrive your Hatcheries to produce monsters 2, 6 or 10 times quicker!
game.mkting_unlock_body: Your Monster Locker is sitting idle, you should start unlocking the #v1#.
game.mkting_unlock_title: Put your Monster Locker to work!
game.mkting_upgradeapult_body: Upgrade your Catapult to unlock the Pebble Bomb and rain down Pebbles in a large area of your enemies yards.
game.mon_alreadyunlocking: You're already unlocking a monster. Please speed it up, wait for the unlock to finish, or cancel it.
game.mon_banditodesc:
Bandito's thick exoskeleton and impeccable accuracy make it the perfect monster assassin.
Favorite Target: Anything
game.mon_banditostream: Thanks to an expedition in the Arctic tundra, #fname# has unlocked Bandito!
game.mon_boltdesc:
#m_bolt# is fast as lightning and can run ahead of your other monsters to munch on buildings with its razor sharp teeth.
Favorite Target: Harvesters, Town Halls and Silos
game.mon_boltstream: The genome has been cracked, #fname# has unlocked #m_bolt#! #m_bolt# is fast as lightning and can run ahead of your other monsters to munch on buildings with its razor sharp teeth.
game.mon_braindesc:
Cunning and greedy, Brain's pulsating cerebral cortex and high intelligence make him perfect for looting resources.
Favorite Target: Harvesters, Town Halls and Silos
game.mon_brainstream: Hide your resources, #fname# has unlocked Brain!
game.mon_confirmcancel: Are you sure you want to cancel unlocking the #v1#?
game.mon_crabatrondesc:
Using its claws to snap towers like twigs, Crabatron strikes fear into the heart its enemies.
Favorite Target: Defensive Towers
game.mon_crabatronstream: Discovered in the depths of the Indian Ocean, #fname# has unlocked Crabatron!
game.mon_wormzerdesc:
Wormzer utilizes his burrowing ability to launch surprise attacks and evade even the toughest walled defense.
Favorite Target: Anything
game.mon_wormzerstream: Thanks to an expedition to the Earth's core  #fname# has unlocked Wormzer.
game.mon_wormzerstreambody: A fierce terrestrial annelid, Wormzer utilizes his burrowing ability to launch surprise attacks and evade even the toughest walled defense.
game.mon_davedesc:
D.A.V.E. only listens to its master and has a habit of completely destroying bases.
Favorite Target: Anything
game.mon_davestream: #fname# has unlocked D.A.V.E., the most powerful monster in the world.
game.mon_davestreambody: The ultimate killing machine, D.A.V.E. has a habit of completely destroying bases.
game.mon_eyeradesc:
Warning: Eye-ra's chemical makeup combusts within close proximity to walls.
Favorite Target: Walls
game.mon_eyerastream: Thanks to innovations in Ophthalmology, #fname# has unlocked Eye-ra!
game.mon_fangdesc:
Fang's bite releases a toxic venom which liquidates any target.
Favorite Target: Anything
game.mon_fangstream: Employing a mixture of chaos and string theory, #fname# has unlocked Fang!
game.mon_finkdesc:
Found deep inside Amazonia, Fink's chemo-receptors make its attacks deadly accurate.
Favorite Target: Anything
game.mon_finkstream: Thanks to an expedition in the Amazon Rainforest, #fname# has unlocked Fink!
game.mon_ichidesc:
Discovered on the peak of Mt. Fuji, Ichi is one of the deadliest monsters and can withstand intense damage from towers and booby traps.
Favorite Target: Defensive Towers
game.mon_ichistream: Thanks to a breakthrough in Cryptozoology, #fname# has unlocked Ichi.
game.mon_infounlocked:
Unlocked
Produce in your #b_hatchery# or train in your #b_monsteracademy#.
game.mon_infounlocking:
Unlocking
Press "Speed Up" to reduce the time remaining.
game.mon_needputty:
You do not have enough #r_puttys# to unlock this monster.

You can build or upgrade your #b_puttysquisher# or you can buy extra #r_puttys# in the #b_generalstore#.
game.mon_octooozedesc:
The slimy #m_octoooze# soaks up fire power like a sponge so other monsters can wreak havoc.
Favorite Target: Defensive Towers
game.mon_octooozestream: Nurtured from a single cell in a test tube, #fname# has unlocked the #m_octoooze#!
game.mon_pokeydesc:
Like a swarm of ants, a roaming pack of #m_pokey#s can devour a grown cow in less than five minutes.
Favorite Target: Anything
game.mon_pokeystream: Due to advancements in technology #fname# has unlocked the #m_pokey#!
game.mon_projectxdesc:
A government experiment gone terribly wrong, Project X is programmed to attack defense towers in battle.
Favorite Target: Defensive Towers
game.mon_projectxstream: A government experiment gone terribly wrong, Project X has escaped and joined forces with #fname#!
game.mon_unlockstart: DANGER: #fname#'s unlocking #v1#, Soon #fname# will have an army of #v2#'s chomping at the bit to destroy your yard. Are you ready?
game.mon_upgradelocker: Your Monster Locker needs to be upgraded to level #v1# to unlock this monster.
game.monsteracademy_desc: Through a demanding curriculum of physics, philosophy and physical education, your Monsters will earn their PhD in Advanced Destruction. Failing that, we have a large supply of steroids.
game.monsterbunker_desc: This defensive housing allows monsters to fight to the death defending your base.
game.monsterjuicer_desc: Got some unwanted monsters in your #b_housing#? Want to make space for bigger and better things? Want to make a sacrifice to the Backyard Gods? Then this is the building for you! Recycle Monsters back into #r_goos# with minimal suffering.
game.monsterlocker_desc: Research and unlock new monsters to hatch in the #b_hatchery#.
game.msg_err_purchase: There was a problem with your purchase, non shiny was affected in this error so please just reload and try again.
game.msg_cantrecycleth: You can not Recycle your Command Center
game.msg_recycleconfirm: Are you sure you want to recycle this building? This can not be undone
game.msg_juicerdamaged: The Monster Juicer is more than 50% damaged and can not function, please wait for it to repair or speed it up.
game.msg_juicerupgrading: The Monster Juice Loosener is upgrading, please wait for the upgrade to finish. You can speed it up by clicking on the MJL and selecting "Speed Up" or by asking friends to visit your yard to help.
game.msg_upgradecancelconfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this upgrade? This can not be undone
game.msg_overcapacity:
You don't have room in your bank.
You need to build more or upgrade existing #b_storagesilo# to increase your banks capacity.
game.msg_updatedgame: 游戏已更新，请重新载入.
game.msg_resourcesforshiny: Purchase the #v1# extra resources needed for #v2# Shiny?
game.msg_trucealreadyrequested: You recently requested a truce with this person and you can't request another for 2 days.
game.pebbleshiner_desc: Produces #r_pebbles#. Used in the construction of buildings
game.planner_tut_1:
Welcome to the Base Planner.
This building gives you a birds eye view of your Yard and makes it quick and easy to move buildings around.
game.planner_tut_2:
To look around:
Just click and drag the map. You can zoom in and out using the buttons at the top. If you want to move small things like wall blocks it is best to zoom in a little first.
game.planner_tut_3:
To move a building:
Click on a building to pick it up, then click again to put it down. You can click and drag to move around while you are holding a building.
game.planner_tut_4:
If you want to see which areas of your yard are protected from attackers, just turn on the tower ranges.
The red circles around each tower show the area they cover.
game.planner_tut_5:
Here's a tip:Try and make sure your towers protect each other by making their range circles cover each other.
Have fun re-designing your Yard!
game.pop_goldenmushroom_body: Congratulations! You've picked a golden mushroom worth #v1# Shiny.
game.pop_questcomplete_body:
Congratulations. You just completed the "#v1#" quest.

Your reward is: #v2#.
game.pop_timeout_body: You've been inactive for a while, are you still playing?
game.pop_damaged: Your base has #v1# damaged buildings. Damaged buildings have reduced productivity or just don't work.
game.pop_levelup_body: Keep up the good work and don't forget to brag about it.
game.pop_levelup_streamtitle: Start the celebration! #fname# is now level #v1#.
game.pop_noshiny_body: Don't worry, you're just a few clicks away from all the Shiny you could ever want or dream of.
game.pop_afk_title: It's better to give than to receive
game.pop_afk_body: Send a FREE GIFT to your friends. Who knows - maybe they'll even return the favor.
game.pop_invitefriends_title: Your friends are all good for now.
game.pop_invitefriends_body: Invite NEW friends to send gifts and get help with upgrades.
game.pop_invitenofriends_body: Invite friends to send gifts and get help with upgrades.
game.pop_hireanother_body: Wait for your worker(s) to finish or hire some extra help.
game.pop_acceptgifts:
Accept Gifts
You have #v1# gifts waiting to be accepted
game.pop_alerts:
Alerts
You have alerts! Click to view
game.pop_experiencebar:
You have #v1# points. You need #v2# more points to reach Level #v3#.

Build, upgrade, complete quests, attack, defend well... pretty much everything you do gives you more points!
game.pop_invite:
Invite Friends
Select friends you think would enjoy playing War Commander
game.pop_mailbox:
Mailbox
Read and send messages to other players
game.pop_helpme: This upgrade may take a while. Invite friends and have them help speed it up!
game.pop_rupgraded_body: Your #v1# has finished upgrading and is now producing #v2# at a much faster rate. It also can hold more which means you can leave it longer between banking!
game.pop_rupgraded_streamtitle: #fname# now has a level #v1# #v2# and is on their way to the top!
game.pop_tupgraded_body: Your #v1# has finished upgrading and is now ready to defend your yard. Upgrading improves range, fire rate and damage!
game.pop_tupgraded_streamtitle: #fname# now has a level #v1# #v2# protecting their yard from Wild Monsters and other players.
game.pop_planner_body: Your Base Planner is ready and waiting for you to do some landscaping!
game.pop_planner_streamtitle: #fname# now has a Base Planner and is doing some 'light' landscaping.
game.pop_hatbuilt_body: You can now convert Goo into Monsters and start to build your Monster army!
game.pop_hatbuilt_streamtitle: #fname# just built a Hatchery and can now transform Goo into Monsters.
game.pop_hatupgraded_streamtitle: #fname#'s Hatchery has been upgraded to Level #v1# and now produces monsters faster.
game.pop_housingupgraded_streamtitle: #fname#'s Monster Housing has been upgraded to Level #v1#
game.pop_housingupgraded_streambody: It may look like a petting zoo, but don't let their cute faces fool you - these Monsters are vicious!
game.pop_hccbuilt_body: Your Hatchery Control Center is ready and waiting for your commands!
game.pop_hccbuilt_streamtitle: New advances in monster management technologies have allowed #fname# to build a Hatchery Control Center.
game.pop_hccbuilt_streambody: Now #fname# can control all Hatcheries from a single location.
game.pop_baiterbuilt_body: Congratulations! You built the Wild Monster Baiter and can now test your yard for defensive weak points. Remember, the more you upgrade the Wild Monster Baiter, the larger the test attacks can be.
game.pop_baiterbuilt_streamtitle: #fname# built a Wild Monster Baiter and can now test their base for defensive weak points.
game.pop_baitupgraded_body: Upgrade to level #v1# completed. You now have even more Musk capacity to attract larger groups of monsters.
game.pop_baitupgraded_streamtitle: #fname#'s Wild Monster Baiter has been upgraded to Level #v1# and can now send larger test attacks.
game.pop_baitupgraded_streambody: Wild Monsters can't get enough of #fname#'s yard.
game.pop_laserbuilt_body: ZAP! You added a Laser Tower to your defenses. Now enemies will think twice before attacking your yard. The more you upgrade it, the more powerful it will become.
game.pop_laserbuilt_streamtitle: ZAP! #fname# built a Laser Tower and is incinerating monsters left and right.
game.pop_acadbuilt_body: You can now start training your monster army!
game.pop_acadbuilt_streamtitle: Fiat Lux! #fname# built a Monster Academy.
game.pop_acadbuilt_streambody: Through a demanding curriculum of physics, philosophy and physical education, #fname#'s Monsters will earn their PhD in Advanced Destruction.
game.pop_flingerupgraded_streamtitle: #fname#'s Flinger has been upgraded to Level #v1#
game.pop_flingerupgraded_streambody: BEWARE: #fname# can now deploy more monsters in each attack.
game.pop_catapultbuilt_body: Congratulations! You've built the Resource Catapult and can now launch twig missiles during an attack.
game.pop_catapultbuilt_streamtitle: #fname# built a Resource Catapult and can now launch twig missiles during an attack.
game.pop_catapultupgraded_body: Congratulations! You've upgraded the Resource Catapult to level #v1# and can now launch new resources during an attack.
game.pop_catapultupgraded2_streamtitle: #fname# now has a Level 2 Resource Catapult and can now launch pebble bombs during an attack.
game.pop_catapultupgraded3_streamtitle: #fname# now has a Level 3 Resource Catapult and can now launch Putty Rage during an attack to engrage monsters and make them more powerful.
game.pop_siloupgraded_streamtitle: #fname#'s Storage Silo has been upgraded to Level #v1#
game.pop_siloupgraded_streambody: #fname# can now store a huge cache of precious resources.
game.pop_clocbuilt_streamtitle: #fname# just built a Monster Locker and has hired top scientists to research new monsters.
game.pop_juicerbuilt_body: Congratulations, you've finished building the Monster Juice Loosener. Sacrifice monsters and return them to their original Goo form and keep the Monster Spirits happy. Beware of blood splatter - this building can get messy.
game.pop_juicerbuilt_streambody: #fname# built a Monster Juice Loosener that grinds up monsters and returns them to their original Goo form.
game.pop_juicerupgraded_body: Upgrade to level #v1# completed. You now get #v2#% Goo back when you send monsters to the MJL
game.pop_juicerupgraded_streamtitle: #fname#'s Monster Juice Loosener has been upgraded to Level #v1#
game.pop_juicerupgraded_streambody: #fname# now gets more Goo from blending monsters.
game.pop_protection_body:
You are protected from other players for
#v1# or until you attack someone.

You can still be attacked by Wild Monsters so keep your guard up!
game.pop_pokeyunlocked: Thanks for unlocking me. I might be small, but I'm quick to build and can help you find the best route into an enemy's base. Start hatching me already!
game.pop_octounlocked: What took you so long to unlock me? I'm the perfect battle companion. My favorite thing to do is to munch on Defensive Towers. Mmmm, Defensive Towers!
game.pop_boltunlocked: What's faster than a speeding bullet? Me! I'm the fastest monster ever created. I'm great for sprinting into enemy bases and devouring Resource Buildings. Gather some goo and start hatching me!
game.pop_finkunlocked: A little known fact about me is that my chemo-receptors are 30 times more powerful than the nose of a human, and people wonder why I'm so accurate in battle. Gather some goo, I'm ready to be hatched!
game.pop_eyeraunlocked: No need to get your eyes checked, I'm unlocked and ready to wreak havoc on your enemies. Send me into battle and I'll blow up any wall in sight. Trust me, my hatch time is well worth the wait.
game.pop_ichiunlocked: Did you know that my hide is used in bullet proof vests? Too bad Defense Towers are a little stronger than normal bullets, that being said, I'm still great for absorbing fire while other monsters do damage. Plus, there's nothing more delicious than eating towers
game.pop_banditounlocked: You've unlocked me, and now I will do your bidding. Consider me your monster assassin - send me into battle and I will destroy anything in my path. Don't believe me? Hatch me and see for yourself.
game.pop_fangunlocked: You thought Black Widows are dangerous? Well you haven't seen the likes of me. My fangs can take down any Wall, Tower or Resource Building. Send me into battle, I live for this type of stuff!
game.pop_brainunlocked: Unlocking me was the smartest thing you've done all week. Not to brag, but I graduated valedictorian from Backyard State and double majored in Looting Resources and Mechanical Engineering. Send me into battle and I'll use my superior intelligence to make sure you come out on top. Gather some goo and fire up the Hatchery!
game.pop_crabunlocked: While I might be as docile as a puppy dog in the ocean, I am an angle of death on land. Now that I am unlocked, I will cut down all of your enemy's towers with my razor-sharp claws. Start hatching me, I can't wait to get into battle.
game.pop_projectxunlocked: Where am I? Where did I come from? Are you my parent? For some reason I have an insatiable hunger for towers. Can you help me ease my hunger pangs?
game.pop_daveunlocked: D.A.V.E. good robot. D.A.V.E. kill! D.A.V.E. destroy! Hatch D.A.V.E. and send D.A.V.E. into battle!
game.pop_oops_body:
Reasons for errors include (but are not limited to):
* Having the game open in more than 1 place.
* Loss of internet connection.
* Your computer running too slowly.

We've logged the error, please reload to continue.

game.snipertower_desc: Long range, high damage, but slow to reload. This tower picks off enemy monsters before they even get close. Protect a larger area with this tower.

game.storagesilo_desc: Increase your banks capacity of #r_twigs#, #r_pebbles#, #r_puttys# and #r_goos#.

game.str_60minutes_desc: Reduce the #v1# time of the #v2# by 2 hours.

game.str_code_bew_body2: One extra worker to help you build and upgrade your village.
game.str_code_bip_body: You can now squeeze even more resources into your bank.
game.str_code_bip_streambody: #fname# is an expert packer and can now squeeze more resources into their bank - letting them save up for more expensive items.

game.str_code_bst_streambody: #fname# is the sharpest tool in the shed and now gets a 20% head start on all construction and upgrade times!
game.str_code_bst_body2: Upgrades started while this is active get a 20% head start (and your workers get hats)

game.str_code_enl_body2: Increase the size of your yard by 10% to make room for more stuff.

game.str_prob_nobaiter: You need to build a Monster Baiter

game.str_holidayprot_body: Gives you 7 days of protection. Removed if you attack anyone.
game.str_ultimateprot_body: Gives you 28 days of protection. Removed if you attack anyone.

game.str_top_50pct: Gives you 50% of your #v1# capacity taking your total #v2# to #v3#.
game.str_top_50pct_noroom: You don't have room for 50% more #v1#, build or upgrade Silos.
game.str_top_fill: Gives you #v1# extra #v2# which takes you to 100% capacity
game.teslatower_desc: Talk about evil science, this high voltage tower fries any enemy that gets within range. Upgrade to improve number of shocks per charge, damage per shock and range.
game.th_recycledesc: You can not recycle this building
game.th_upgradedesc: Upgrade to unlock new structures, upgrade levels and abilities.
game.th_willbuildmore: You will be able to build more:
game.th_willupgrade: You will be able to upgrade your:
game.townhall_desc: The hub of any great yard and the first building you need to build. Upgrading the #b_townhall# unlocks new buildings, features and lets you upgrade other buildings to a higher level.
game.tut_101:
Now let's use the Map Room to find the Wild Monster Tribe that attacked you and strike back with our Pokey army!

Click on the Map menu.
game.tut_102:
This is the Backyard Monster map.

Click on the Legionnaire Wild Monster base and select Attack!
game.tut_110: This is a Legionnaire Wild Monster base. Looks like they have no defenses!
game.tut_111:
On the left you can see the Pokeys you have in your Housing. Press the "+" icon to add them to the Flinger.

Click and hold the "+" to add at least 15 to the Flinger.
game.tut_112: Good, now select where you want to fling them. You can't fling in monsters too close to buildings so make sure the drop zone circle is white before you click it.
game.tut_113: Excellent! Your Pokeys have been flung in and are attacking the enemy yard
game.tut_113_more: Excellent! Your Pokeys have been flung in and are attacking the enemy yard. You can click the "+" to select some more and Fling them in to help if you want.
game.tut_114: I bet they wish they had defenses now!
game.tut_115: Your Pokeys are looting resources from their Resource Harvesters!
game.tut_116: Once their base is destroyed you'll be victorious.
game.tut_120: Congratulations, you leveled their entire backyard base!
game.tut_130: Good work, check out that loot!
game.tut_140: Build a Hatchery to start producing monsters! Click on the Buildings menu.
game.tut_144: Now, place it somewhere in your backyard.
game.tut_145: Don't forget to Speed Up the Hatchery construction.
game.tut_150:
Now that your Hatchery is ready try turning some Goo into monsters!

Click on the Hatchery and select View Hatchery.
game.tut_151: Click on Pokey to add it to the production queue. You can click on it several times to add more than one.
game.tut_152:
Good work!

When you are done close the Hatchery.
game.tut_160: Unlocking Monsters and keeping your Hatchery in production requires Putty and Goo. Let's build some Putty and Goo Harvesters. Click on the Buildings menu.
game.tut_164: Now, place it somewhere in your backyard.
game.tut_170: Build a Goo Factory. Click on the Buildings menu.
game.tut_174: Place it somewhere in your backyard.
game.tut_180: Nice job! Your backyard base is now ready for action! Try upgrading your Command Center to unlock better buildings.
game.tut_181: Also, build the 'Monster Locker' and unlock new monsters!
game.tut_190: While this counter is here other players can't attack you.
game.tut_191:
Open the Quests menu to see what you should be doing next to collect rewards.

Good luck!
game.tut_20:
Let's upgrade your Twig Snapper to Level 2 so it works faster.

Click on your Twig Snapper.
game.tut_22: Here you can see the benefits and cost of an upgrade. Click the Use Resources button to start.
game.tut_23: Click on the upgrading Twig Snapper.
game.tut_25:
Buy "Close Enough" to finish the upgrade instantly.

The "Close Enough" speed-up is free for upgrades with 5 minutes or less remaining.
game.tut_26:
Congratulations! Your Twig Snapper is now Level 2.

Click Quests to collect your reward.
game.tut_3:
Resource Harvesters work until they're full so it's important to empty them often.

Click on your Twig Snapper.
game.tut_31:
Now, let's build Sniper Tower to defend your yard.

Click on the Buildings menu.
game.tut_32:
Here you can browse all the different buildings you can add to your yard.

Click the Defensive buildings tab.
game.tut_34: Here you can see the description, requirements and cost of the Sniper Tower. Press Build.
game.tut_35: Now place it in your yard by clicking on the grass.
game.tut_36: Click on the Sniper Tower and select Speed Up.
game.tut_38: Your Sniper Tower is complete and will  now fire on any intruders that try to attack your base. Collect your reward!
game.tut_4: Click Bank to collect twigs from your Twig Snapper.
game.tut_40:
WHOA! Just in time, here come some Wild Monsters!

Don't worry, the Sniper Tower should make short work of them, just sit back and watch the action.
game.tut_42: Oooh, looks like you completed a rather bloody quest for defending your yard. Don't forget to collect the reward by clicking on Quests menu.
game.tut_44: That attack came from the nearby Legionnaire Wild Monster Tribe. Let's strike back before they get a chance to build up a larger attack!
game.tut_5: Nice work! You've banked #v1# Twigs. Twigs are used to build and upgrade structures.
game.tut_50: The first thing we need to do is build housing for your monster army. Click on the Buildings menu.
game.tut_54:
Place it somewhere in your backyard.

You can click and drag to move the backyard around to find space.
game.tut_55: Select your Monster Housing, then click on Speed Up.
game.tut_57:
We've recruited some Pokeys to help. Pokeys are a little slow and small but what they lack in strength they make up for in numbers!

Collect your reward now.
game.tut_60: Here's some Shiny to spend in the Store. Use some of it to hire a second worker.
game.tut_62:
Click Buy to hire a second worker.

Buying extra workers is a great way to get things done more quickly.
game.tut_63: You now have 2 workers and can build or upgrade 2 things at a time.
game.tut_65: Now let's build a Flinger so we can fling our Pokeys into the enemy backyard. Click on the Buildings menu.
game.tut_69: Place it somewhere in your backyard (remember, you can click and drag to find space).
game.tut_90: With the second worker let's build a Map Room at the same time. Click on the Buildings menu.
game.tut_95: Click on the Flinger and select Speed Up.
game.tut_96: Since the Flinger takes longer than 5 minutes to build, let's buy the "Finish Building NOW!' speed-up.
game.tut_97: Now Speed Up the construction of your Map Room in the same way.
game.tut_99: Time to collect some quest rewards for all that new construction!
game.tut_recycle_locked: Building recycling is locked for in the tutorial.
game.twigsnapper_desc: Produces Twigs. Used in the construction of buildings
game.ui_needmoreroom:
Not enough room.
Build more or upgrade existing storage silos
game.ui_placeinstorage:
Remove this building from your base and place in storage?

You will be able to build it again at no cost.
game.ui_worker_5busy: All 5 of your workers are busy.
game.ui_worker_xbusy: You have #v1# workers so you can only have #v2# things upgrading or building  at a time, wait for your worker to finish or if you are impatient purchase another worker from the General Store
game.ui_worker_busy: Your worker is busy, wait for your worker to finish or if you are impatient purchase another worker from the 'General Store'
game.ui_worker_waitforfinish: Your worker is busy, you need to wait for your worker to finish.
game.ui_worker_impatient: If you are impatient you should build the 'General Store' next to buy an extra worker.
game.ui_worker_tute: You will be able to hire more workers soon.
game.wildmonsterbaiter_desc: Sprays a musk into the air that Wild Monsters can't resist causing them to flock to your base, a great way to test your defenses. If it gets too much for you the building has a siren you can use to scare them off.
game.woodenblock_desc: A simple block, use it to build walls to protect buildings and channel attackers into traps or closer to towers. Can be upgraded from wood to stone to metal to gold.
game.yardplanner_desc: Quickly move some things around or completely remodel your layout! This building gives you a birds eye view of your base and makes moving buildings a snip.
game.str_code_bip_body2: Improves the capacity of all resources by 10%
game.str_code_hod2_body2: 6x the speed of all Hatcheries for 1 hour. Does not stack with other overdrives.
game.str_code_hod3_body2: 10x the speed of all Hatcheries for 1 hour. Does not stack with other overdrives.
game.str_code_hod_body2: Need to rebuild your monster army in a hurry? 4x the speed of all Hatcheries for 1 hour.
game.str_code_musk_body: Top off your Monster Baiter's Musk levels to attract larger groups of Wild Monsters.
game.str_code_pro1_body2: Gives you 24 hours protection. Removed if you attack anyone.
game.str_code_pro2_body2: Gives you 7 days of protection. Removed if you attack anyone.
game.str_code_pro3_body2: Gives you 28 days of protection. Removed if you attack anyone.
game.pop_unlock_complete:
#v1# unlocked!
Produce them in the Hatchery.
game.bubble_getshiny: Click "Add" to get more Shiny for your yard.
game.str_resourcesfull: You have all the #v1# you can hold, build or upgrade Silos.
game.loc_tut_1:
You can only produce monsters you've unlocked in the Monster Locker.

Select a monster on the left and start unlocking!
game.bdg_resource_uprade: 生产速度从#v1#/小时增加至#v2#/小时。最大容量增加#v3#个单位
game.bdg_resource_full: Building Full, production paused. Bank now!

game.newmap_g1:
A brave new world
Welcome to the World Map! You can now control more than one backyard by conquering land and building Outposts.
game.newmap_g2: After you destroy 90% of a wild monster or player's Outpost, you will get the option to "Take Ownership" of their yard.
game.newmap_g3: Outposts, like your main backyard, can be used to harvest resources and hatch monsters.
game.newmap_g4: After destroying a wild monster base, you can choose between three different starter kits to help build your Outpost, but after destroying a player's Outpost, you gain control of all their buildings!
game.newmap_g5:
New Damage Protection rules
Outposts get a short amount of Damage Protection if you fail to destroy them in two attacks. However, an Outpost will get a longer period of protection when ownership changes hands or when a player returns to their destroyed Outpost.
game.newmap_g6:
If at any point you want to opt out of the World Map, just recycle your Map Room.

If you want to opt back into the World Map, simply build and upgrade you Map Room again. (Note: You'll be placed in a new part of the world with different players around you).

game.btn_buildingGreatTf:
拨款说明：
1、成就类建筑需完成“拨款”后才会产生作用。
2、每次拨款消耗石油及金属资源，拨款后建筑的“完成度”上升，当完成度达到要求后该建筑建造或升级完成。
3、拨款时完成度的增加有概率产生2倍暴击、4倍暴击和8倍暴击，暴击时可获得额外完成度奖励。
4、“批量拨款”即将玩家现有的全部资源对该建筑进行拨款，剩余资源不足一次拨款时为止。
5、成就类建筑可升至12级，建筑等级越高，对部队属性加成越多。
game.btn_buildingGreatB:
成就建筑说明：
1、当玩家等级达到25级且指挥中心达到5级时可以建造成就类建筑。
2、建造成就类建筑后，玩家需对该建筑进行拨款才能完成该建筑的建造。
3、成就建筑的建造与玩家的国籍无关。
4、成就建筑建造完成后，可分别提升玩家步兵、坦克、飞机类单位的攻击力与最大血量。

game.techDescription:
科技系统介绍：
1、 您在攻击其他玩家后，系统根据您对对方基地造成的损伤程度以及双方等级给予您荣誉值
2、您可以通过在配件中心探索，有机会探索获得荣誉值
3、每日攻击同一玩家三次后若继续攻击该玩家将不再获得荣誉值
4、每日攻击其他玩家次数达到20次后将不再获得荣誉值
5、升级科技需要首先满足升级条件，提升作战实验室的等级以及玩家等级可以解决该问题
6、使用荣誉值或者勋章均可升级科技，提升科技等级会明显提升您的战斗力，可以增加您的战斗胜率或者减少你的战斗损失
7、在科技等级达到60级（时间之源和闪电战除外）后，升级科技需要使用荣誉加勋章或仅使用勋章升级
8、时间之源和闪电战在达到50级后，升级需要使用荣誉加勋章或仅使用勋章升级。

game.activityDescContent:
活动说明
1、每周定时开启防守挑战赛。
2、在限定时间内，尽量防守住敌人的进攻。
3、每成功防守5关敌人，将会有一次奖励。
4、全部成功防守45关敌人，将获得丰厚奖励！

胜利条件：消灭所有进攻部队。
失败条件：5分钟内没有消灭进攻部队；指挥中心被摧毁。

game.remouldInfo:
改造说明：
1、某些特定的建筑达到5星后，可以进行改造。
2、改造消耗荣誉或者勋章。
3、改造过程中有一定的概率会失败。
4、改造失败后，有一定概率使当前改造等级降低1级。
5、当改造等级达到4、7、9级时，改造失败不会降级。

game.weaponCenterDesc:
配件中心说明：
1、在配件中心内购买不同数额的石油资源，可免费获赠探索不同场景的机会一次。
2、购买500石油可免费获赠探索野外场景1次，购买1000石油可免费获赠工厂探索1次，购买5000石油可免费获赠实验室探索1次。
3、在配件中心内探索，可以额外获赠不同品质的配件、书籍、不同等级的徽记以及不同品质的干扰器。
4、获赠的配件、书籍、徽记、干扰器可以在相应的类别内进行激活，激活后增加相应的激活效果。
5、配件用于增加兵种的相应能力。
6、书籍用于增加将领的相应能力等。
7、徽记用于增加基地的相应能力。
8、干扰器用于增加基地战和集团军营战能力。
9、当背包内拥有探索卡的时候，可以在相应的场景内消耗探索卡进行探索。
10、当勾选“优先使用探索卡”后，将优先使用探索卡进行探索。
11、当探索卡的数量不能满足探索次数时，剩余的次数将会消耗勋章进行探索。
12、工厂探索石油资源，14%获得荣誉，1%获得勋章，21%获得中级补给箱或中级钥匙，27%获得资源，10%获得书籍，3%获得徽记，10%获得配件，3%获得畅饮券，12%获得干扰器。
13、实验室探索石油资源，11%获得荣誉，1%获得勋章，14%获得高级补给箱或高级钥匙，12%获得书籍，2%获得徽记，31%获得配件，3%获得豪饮券，25%获得干扰器。
14、配件中心无法抽取到VIP配件。

game.weaponComInfo:
配件组装说明：
1、通过基地探索可以获得配件，配件激活后增加相应兵种的作战能力。
2、配件可进行组装，书籍或配件或者干扰器均可用来提升配件的等级，组装后副位置的书籍或配件或干扰器将消失。
3、被锁定的配件不能成为副配件，不会被一键组装。
4、高品质书籍或配件或干扰器不能为低品质配件提供经验。
5、配件中心等级不足6级时，橙色配件最多升级到10级；配件中心达到6级之后，可以升到12级。
6、组装时，超过配件满级经验的多余经验将被系统回收。
7、进阶升级过的橙色书籍、配件或干扰器可以为未进阶升级的橙色品质提供经验。
8、一键组装默认消耗紫色及紫色以下品质配件，强化型配件不会被一键组装。
9、精工等级高的配件不能为低精工等级配件提供经验。
10、第9.10孔，只能安装燃烧弹，被帽穿甲弹，防弹格栅，抑爆装置，同时新增的2个孔位不能放置2个相同的配件，且不能放置老的配件。
11、新增的4个配件（燃烧弹，被帽穿甲弹，防弹格栅，抑爆装置，）仅能放置到坦克中，在吃除本体和新增的经验道具时，只能获得该道具1/4的经验。例：燃烧弹当主配件组装时，选择了1个400经验的副橙色配件，那么点击组装后，只能获得100经验。
12、新的配件孔位在玩家红警大战vip有效期内生效，vip过期，则装备的配件属性失效。
13、装备生效渠道，燃烧弹（基地战与征战不生效），被帽穿甲弹（仅在征战世界中生效），防弹格栅（基地战与征战不生效），抑爆装置（仅在征战世界中生效）。
14、一键组装不会消耗VIP配件。
15、主VIP配件进行组装时，任何品质的副配件、干扰器、书籍仅能提供自身1/4的经验。例：1级未培养的强化破坏者弹头，自身携带1008经验，但组装时仅能给主VIP配件提供252经验。
16、主VIP配件进行组装时，副VIP配件可以提供100%携带的经验。

game.slaveAttackDesc:
占领说明：
完全摧毁这个基地吧！（城墙除外）

占领不会拥有对方资源。

game.slaveRobDesc:
抢占说明：
消灭现在的占领者，您将占领这个基地！
抢占不会拥有对方资源。
game.slaveSaveDesc:
解救说明：
摧毁对方的战俘营，将解救您的好友！
解救将获得额外奖励。
解救不会拥有对方资源。
game.slaveFightDesc:
反抗说明：
在反抗战斗中，将对方的战俘营摧毁，则反抗成功。
game.slaveSlaveOptDesc:
占领说明：
1、占领与对方保护时间无关，与对方是否在线无关。
2、占领需要一次性摧毁对方的所有建筑（围墙除外）。
3、被占领者采集金属或石油时，会额外产生10%的资源给占领者。
4、被占领者进行反抗时需摧毁对方的战俘营才能解除被占领状态。
5、可以对被占领的好友进行解救。
6、占领获得功勋值，功勋可在功勋商城中兑换徽记宝箱。
7、每天前三次“进攻”状态下，摧毁其他玩家战俘营，可拥有20%未收取的功勋值。
game.slaveFightOptDesc:
反抗说明：
1、基地被占领后，被占领者可以对占领者发动反抗。
2、在反抗战斗中，将对方的战俘营摧毁，则反抗成功。
3、反抗成功后，被占领的玩家将重获自由。
4、反抗不会抢夺任何资源。
5、保护时间内，仍可进行反抗。
game.slaveAttackShare: 我指挥的钢铁军队将踏遍红警世界的每一个角落，等着被我征服吧！！！哈哈哈…
game.slaveSaveShare: 正义不败，保卫世界和平的重任就由我来肩负吧！哈哈哈…
game.slaveSlaveOptDesc2:
资源地说明：
1、可将其他指挥官的基地添加为自己的资源地。
2、一键操作可快速对资源地仓库内的金属、石油进行收取。
3、请在其他指挥官基地中进行资源地添加。
4、VIP等级越高，可添加的资源地越多。
5、每个基地，只能作为一位指挥官的资源地。
6、收取的资源量与完全摧毁此基地的获取量相同。
7、被收取之后的基地进入保护，保护时间与完全摧毁时相同。
8、在线、等级相差太多、进入保护的资源地无法收取资源。
9、每日可收取次数与vip等级相关。
10、对单个资源地收取一次资源，消耗1次收取。

game.fightPointDesc:
战斗力说明：
1、当前已解锁兵种的生命值、攻击力和攻击范围等属性会影响战斗力。
2、提升兵种的等级或者激活零件可以有效的提升战斗力。
3、玩家的总战斗力会对进攻时的出战部队提供攻击力加成，战斗力数值越高加成效果越明显。
4、战斗力排行榜每日凌晨5点更新。
game.admiralPointDesc:
将领评分说明：
1、将领等级提升、学习技能等可以有效增加将领战斗力。
2、将领评分排行榜每日5点更新。
game.pvePointDesc:
征战世界排行说明：
1、征战世界排行榜每日5点更新。
game.pveAllRegionDesc:
征战至强排行说明：
1.征战至强排行榜为跨服排行榜。
2.通过征战116关后产生评分。
3.通过的征战关卡数越多，评分越高。
4.征战关数相同，胜利时剩余血量越高，评分越高。

game.bagFAQ_txt:
背包说明：
1、获得的道具、宝箱、卡片会放入背包中。
2、背包容量可扩充、相同道具可叠加。
3、当背包容量已满后，获得的道具将放入临时背包中。
4、放入临时背包中的物品，需要放入背包后才能使用。
5、放入临时背包中的物品，24小时内未放入背包则该物品消失。
6、背包信息可以查看背包内道具获得及使用信息。

game.shop_discounts_success5:
注：1.【限定特惠商品】（红标）每天只会出现1次，无论是否购买，刷新后当天将不再出现该商品（限定特惠折扣）。
2.在双月卡生效期内，【双月卡专属特惠商品】每天只会出现1次，无论是否购买刷新后当天将不再出现该商品。所有商品全部展示后将不再刷出【双月卡专属商品位】。
game.shop_discounts_success2: 当前货架中的限定特惠商品，刷新后当天不会再刷出相同的特惠价格。是否确定刷新？
game.shop_discounts_success3: 今日已无“限定特惠商品”可展示。是否确定刷新？
game.shop_discounts_success4:
特惠商店说明
1、商店随机展示6个商品供指挥官花费勋章购买。
2、每日0点系统自动刷新1次商品，指挥官可以花费10勋章/次自主刷新商品。
3、每商品不同价格、每日均有不同的限购数量，达到限购数量后当天将不会再刷出该商品的相同价格。限购数量每日0点重置。
4、每种“限定特惠标签商品”（限定特惠折扣）每天只会出现1次，无论是否购买，当天将不再刷出该商品（限定特惠折扣）。
5、若前4次刷新未出“限定特惠标签商品”，则第5次必出。若中途刷新到、次数将被重置。每日0点系统自动刷新也计入次数，可跨天累计。
6、商品展示概率公示：商品的“原价”/“75%折价格”/“65%折价格”）—单商品展示概率均为0.72%；“限定特惠折扣”—单商品展示概率均为0.18%。
7、“双月卡专属特惠商品”：1级~10级参谋技能书（折扣均为1折）。双月卡用户在有效期内，商店每页均可刷出1个，无论是否购买刷新后将不再展示。以上所有专属商品全部展示后，将不再刷出。
game.shop_discounts_success6: 双月卡特权：月卡和VIP月卡同时生效期内，每页可刷出1个“双月卡专属特惠”10%折商品位。

game.emblemDescContent:
徽记配备说明
1、徽记的等级从低到高分别为1到10级。
2、徽记的类型分为：增加建筑血量、增加对兵伤害、增加对空伤害、增加对坦克伤害、减少兵对基地伤害、减少坦克对基地伤害、减少飞机对基地伤害、增加攻击射程、增加飞行速度、增加石油产量、增加金属产量、增加对步兵，坦克，空军，英雄伤害、减少受到步兵，坦克，空军，英雄伤害。
3、获得的徽记可以在相应的类别内进行配备，配备后增加相应的配备效果。
4、同等级同属性的徽记可升级，升级可提高徽记等级及属性。
5、升级时，超过徽记满级经验的多余经验将被系统回收。
6、已激活的6个徽记等级达到5级可开启第7个徽记位置，已激活的7个徽记等级达到7级可开启第8个徽记位置。解锁新徽记位置会获得经验徽记奖励。
7、八个徽记不可相互重复。
8、全攻徽记和全防徽记仅能配备在第七、八徽记位置上。
9、全攻徽记和全防徽记仅能通过吞噬与其相同的徽记（等级可不同）完成升级。
game.emblemOptError20: 超出满级经验的#v1#经验将被系统回收，是否继续？
game.emblemUpgradeAuto: 将徽记一键升至最高级
game.weaponBookTipAbility:
书籍效果：
增加出战将领属性。
game.weaponBookDesc:
将领培训说明：
1、通过工厂探索和实验室探索可以获得书籍，书籍在装备后可提升出战将领的属性。
2、书籍可进行升级，书籍或配件或干扰器均可用来提升书籍的等级，升级后副位置的书籍或配件将消失。
3、被锁定的书籍不能成为副书籍，不会被一键升级。
4、高品质书籍或配件或干扰器不能为低品质书籍提供经验。
5、已装备的书籍可增加所有出战将领的属性，出战将领越多，效果越大。
6、配件中心等级不足6级时，橙色书籍最多升级到10级；配件中心达到6级之后，可以升到12级。
7、升级时，超过书籍满级经验的多余经验将被系统回收。
8、进阶升级过的橙色书籍、配件或干扰器可以为未进阶升级的橙色品质提供经验。
9、一键升级默认消耗紫色及紫色以下品质书籍，加强型书籍不会被一键升级。

game.weaponAdvBookInfoDesc:
1、加强型书籍可进行领悟。
2、领悟之后的书籍，额外增加的属性增强。
3、领悟需要消耗对应领悟材料，不需要消耗同名书籍。
4、根据获取的加强型书籍获得不同数量和种类的领悟材料。
5、领悟还原消耗勋章，100%返还消耗的领悟材料。
6、获得《加强型战争论》时获赠6个勇气核心，获得《加强型制空权》时获赠6个统御核心，获得《加强型战略论》时获赠6个战略核心，获得《加强型装甲战》时获赠6个魅力核心，获得《加强型绝对武器》时获赠3个勇气核心3个统御核心，获得《加强型军事战略》时获赠3个勇气核心3个战略核心，获得《加强型战争指导》时获赠3个勇气核心3个魅力核心，获得《加强型制胜的科学》时获赠3个统御核心3个战略核心，获得《加强型战争艺术概论》时获赠3个魅力核心3个统御核心，获得《加强型大战略》时获赠3个战略核心3个魅力核心。

game.weaponAdvJammerInfoDesc:
1、加强型干扰器可进行增幅。
2、增幅之后的干扰器，额外增加的属性增强。
3、增幅需要消耗对应增幅材料，不需要消耗同名干扰器。
4、根据获取的加强型干扰器获得不同数量和种类的增幅材料。
5、增幅还原消耗勋章，100%返还消耗的增幅材料。
6、获得《加强型反坦干扰》时获赠3个尖端仪器3个精密零件，获得《加强型电磁干扰》时获赠3个尖端仪器3个精密零件，获得《加强型感应干扰》时获赠1个尖端仪器，获得《加强型热能干扰》时获赠3个尖端仪器3个精密零件，获得《加强型湿度干扰》时获赠3个耐热合金3个双极芯片，获得《加强型辉光干扰》时获赠1个尖端仪器，获得《加强型弧光干扰》时获赠1个精密零件，获得《加强型射频干扰》时获赠1个精密零件，获得《加强型带外干扰》时获赠1个尖端仪器1个精密零件，获得《加强型阻塞干扰》时获赠1个尖端仪器1个精密零件，获得《加强型同频干扰》时获赠1个尖端仪器1个精密零件,获得《加强型互调干扰》时获赠1个尖端仪器，获得《加强型邻频干扰》时获赠1个精密零件,获得《加强型金属干扰》时获赠1个尖端仪器，获得《加强型石油干扰》时获赠1个精密零件,获得《加强型装甲干扰》时获赠6个耐热合金，获得《加强型复合干扰》时获赠6个双极芯片。

game.npcActivityDescContent:
军团的逆袭说明：
1.军团的逆袭活动期间内从10:00到22:00每隔一小时会刷新出三个难度不同的BOSS供玩家攻击。
2.玩家可以选择任意BOSS进行攻击，点击攻击后，只有在5分钟内摧毁BOSS基地内除了围墙外的所有建筑和部队才算作胜利。
3.玩家攻击BOSS胜利后，根据BOSS难度可以获得相应的奖励宝箱。
4.每个玩家每天有四次挑战机会，每次成功击杀BOSS获得宝箱后会扣除一次挑战机会，攻击BOSS失败不会扣除挑战机会。

game.admiralInfoDescContent:
将领说明：
1、在【金属冶炼】标签内购买金属资源，可免费获赠将领一名，不同品级的金属冶炼，获赠的将领品质不同。【名将一览】中将记录曾经获得过的将领档案。
2、将领的状态分为出战状态和休息状态。指挥中心内可以对已经获得的将领进行出战设定。战斗中攻防双方全部出战将领的属性对比会影响将领对部队能力的加成。
3、重复获得紫色品质将领时原有紫色将领的培养经验会增加，培养等级提升后可大幅提升将领的各项能力。
4、重复获得白、绿、蓝色将领后，将领会自动转化为将魂，将魂可用于提升将领的各项属性。
5、不同品质的将领流放后可以获得不同数量的将魂，成长将领属性所消耗的将魂将在流放将领时一并返还。
6、将领处于已出战状态时每天前20次通过卫星【进攻】其他玩家时可获得经验，获得的经验值与摧毁对方的建筑及兵种有关。
7、玩家可将等级1级以上的未出战将领的经验传授给其他将领，转移过程中会有部分经验损耗，传授方将领等级变为1级。 8、已装备的装备国籍一致时，可激活国家套装效果。 9、紫色以上的将领技能可以升级，升级消耗学习书。在技能等级提升至4、7、10时可以开启新的隐藏属性，且升级时不掉级。
10、低级冶炼必得白色以上品质将领，28%几率必得绿色以上品质将领。
11、中级冶炼100%获赠绿色及以上品质将领。
12、高级冶炼100%获赠蓝色及以上品质将领。
13、低级冶炼连续冶炼50次，未得蓝色品质将领则第50次冶炼必送蓝将。
14、中级冶炼连续冶炼50次，未得蓝色和紫色品质将领则第51次冶炼必送蓝将。
15、高级冶炼连续冶炼50次，未得紫色品质将领则第51次冶炼必送紫将
16、将领四星后，每再获得一个相同将领，都将获得属性加成，每一星级总属性加成和之前相同。
17、紫色将领培养到橙色后，为了防止误流放，需要在将领信息页面进行流放，无法在将领流放页面进行批量操作。
game.admiralInfoDescContent1:
将领说明：
1、战斗中部队的生命值和伤害值等属性=（部队基本属性+将领技能效果）×（1+配件/徽记加成）×（1+将领加成），配件和徽记会被将领能力进一步加成。
2、在战斗中勇气可提升部队的攻击力、战略可提升部队的防御力、统御可提升部队的生命值、魅力可提升部队的暴击率。
3、将领的相性影响将领对不同兵种单位的能力加成，相性由高到低分别为：S、A、B、C、D。
4、出战将领的同类型技能（例如：天启坦克射程）最多同时生效两个，合理搭配将领的组合才能发挥最大作用。
game.admiralSkillStrengthDesc:
技能升级说明：
1、紫色的将领技能可以通过升级提升技能的属性。
2、在技能等级提升至4、7、10时可以开启新的隐藏属性，且升级时不掉级。
3、升级技能消耗学习书，不同品质的学习书增加的成功率不同，1级学习书可以通过每日战功兑换获得，更高级的学习书可以在装备界面物品合成中合成。
4、升级有一定几率失败，失败会降级。可以放入幸运符增加成功率，放入保护符避免失败后降级。
5、将领技能等级可以传授给其他将领。
6、部队生命、秒伤、相性指的是所有作战单位的生命、秒伤、相性。
7、书籍收集可能获得物品：各等级的学习书，高级招募卡，中级招募卡，实验室探索卡，小技能幸运符，大技能幸运符，技能保护符。
8、书籍收集（勋章收集）获得物品概率：2级学习书45.00%、3级学习书5.00%、4级学习书0.10%、5级学习书0.001%、实验室探索卡20.00%、高级招募卡0.50%、中级招募卡10.00%、小技能幸运符9.40%、大技能幸运符5.00%、技能保护符5.00%。
game.admiralLetterDesc:
将领碎片说明:
1.玩家通过参与活动可以获得将领碎片。
2.集齐指定数量的碎片可以合成对应将领。
3.对于已经拥有的将领依然可以合成，如果是蓝色及以下品质的将领自动获得对应将魂，如果是紫色品质将领会转化为该将领的培养经验。
game.admiralMilitarySoulDesc:
军魂说明:
1.军魂增加将领属性。
2.消耗军魂点数激活之后，属性才可生效。
3.军魂激活之后，可消耗军魂点数领悟此军魂对应的军魂技能。
4.每个军魂可领悟的军魂技能范围不同。
5.军魂技能有不同品质,品质越高属性越好。
6.消耗军魂点数可升级军魂、军魂技能，升级提升相关属性。
7.可消耗技能重置令，重置已学习技能，技能消耗军魂点数全部返还。
8.技能可锁定，锁定后不会被重置。
9.军魂10级、30级、45级各开放1个锁定权限。
10.军魂等级决定军魂技能上限；提升军魂等级，增加军魂技能等级上限。
11.概率公示：坚不可摧·士兵 绿3.02%，坚不可摧·士兵 蓝2.51%，坚不可摧·士兵 紫0.50%，坚不可摧·坦克 绿1.26%，坚不可摧·坦克 蓝1.05%，坚不可摧·坦克 紫0.21%，坚不可摧·飞机 绿4.27%，坚不可摧·飞机 蓝3.56%，坚不可摧·飞机 紫0.71%，血战到底 绿5.53%，血战到底 蓝4.61%，血战到底 紫0.92%，厚德载物 绿5.53%，厚德载物 蓝4.61%，厚德载物 紫0.92%，草木皆兵·士兵 绿3.77%，草木皆兵·士兵 蓝3.14%，草木皆兵·士兵 紫0.63%，草木皆兵·飞机 绿5.03%，草木皆兵·飞机 蓝4.19%，草木皆兵·飞机 紫0.84%，黔驴技穷·士兵 绿3.77%，黔驴技穷·士兵 蓝3.14%，黔驴技穷·士兵 紫0.63%，黔驴技穷·坦克 绿1.76%，黔驴技穷·坦克 蓝1.47%，黔驴技穷·坦克 紫0.29%，黔驴技穷·飞机 绿5.03%，黔驴技穷·飞机 蓝4.19%，黔驴技穷·飞机 紫0.84%，摧枯拉朽 绿5.53%，摧枯拉朽 蓝4.61%，摧枯拉朽 紫0.92%，危如累卵 绿5.53%，危如累卵 蓝4.61%，危如累卵 紫0.92%。
game.admiralGroupContent:
档案说明：
1、获得已拥有的紫色将领可激活名将buff。
2、将领图鉴内拥有对应组合的将领可自动激活组合。
3、将领组合激活后才可以进行升级，每满10级需进阶1次后继续升级。
4、获得组合内将领可以获赠对应印记，使用印记进阶组合。
5、将领组合激活后可以提升相应兵种属性。
